definition: To defeat someone in a game, competition, election, or battle
example_in_english: England needed to beat Germany to get to the final.
example_in_uzbek: Angliya finalga chiqish uchun Germaniyani mag'lub etishi kerak edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Angliya finalǵa shiǵiw ushin Germaniyanı jeńiwi kerek edi.

definition: Any game in which you move objects around on a special board
example_in_english: I think that Trivial Pursuit is my favourite board game.
example_in_uzbek: Menimcha, Trivial Pursuit mening eng sevimli stol o'yinim.
example_in_karakalpak: Menińshe, Trivial Pursuit meniń eń súyikli stol oyınım.

definition: The person who is in charge of a team or organisation
example_in_english: She was captain of the Olympic swimming team.
example_in_uzbek: U Olimpiada suzish guruhining sardori edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol Olimpiada júziw toparınıń sardarı edi.

definition: To invite someone to compete or fight
example_in_english: The girls challenged the boys to a cricket match.
example_in_uzbek: Qizlar yigitlarni krikket o'ynashga da'vat etishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Qızlar jigitlerdi krikket oynawga shaqırdı.

uzbek_word: musobaqaga yoki urushga chorlamoq, da'vat etmoq
definition: Something that needs a lot of skill, energy, and determination to deal with or achieve
example_in_english: I felt I needed a new challenge at work.
example_in_uzbek: Men ish joyimda o'zim uchun yangi sinov kerakligini his qildim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men jumıs ornımda ózim ushın jańa sınaq kerekligin sezdim.

definition: Someone who has won an important competition, especially in sport
example_in_english: He finally became the world heavyweight boxing champion.
example_in_uzbek: U vanixoyat og'ir vazn toifasida dunyo chempioni bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol aqırında awır salmaq kategoriyasında jáhán chempionı boldı.

definition: To behave dishonestly, or to not obey rules
example_in_english: Kids have always found ways of cheating in school exams.
example_in_uzbek: Bolalar har doim maktab imtihonlarida aldash usullarini topganlar.
example_in_karakalpak: Balalar barqulla mektep imtixanlarında aldaw usılların tapqan.

definition: Serious music that is played on instruments such as the piano and the violin
example_in_english: I love classical music, like Beethoven.
example_in_uzbek: Menga mumtoz musiqa yoqadi, masalan Bethoven.
example_in_karakalpak: Maǵan klassikalıq muzıka unaydı, máselen, Betxoven.

definition: An organisation for people who take part in a particular activity, or the building that they use
example_in_english: Why don't you join a chess club?
example_in_uzbek: Nega shaxmat klubiga qo'shilmaysiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Nege shaxmat klubına qosılmaysız?

definition: Someone who trains a sports player or team
example_in_english: After playing for ten years, Barry became a baseball coach.
example_in_uzbek: 10 yil (beysbol) o'ynagandan keyin, Barri beysbol murabbiyi bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: 10 jil (beysbol) oynagannan keyin, Barri beysbol treneri boldi.

definition: An organised event in which people try to win prizes by being better than other people
example_in_english: He'd entered a competition in the local newspaper.
example_in_uzbek: U mahalliy nashriyotdagi musobaqaga qo'shildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol jergilikli baspaxanadaǵı jarısqa qosıldı.

definition: An event at which an orchestra, band, or musician plays or sings in front of an audience
example_in_english: Did you hear that the Rolling Stones did a concert in China?
example_in_uzbek: Rolling Stones guruhi Xitoyda konsert berganini eshitdingizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Rolling Stones toparı Qıtayda koncert bergenin esitkenbisiz?

definition: To win against someone
example_in_english: France defeated Italy 3-1.
example_in_uzbek: Fransiya Italiyani 3-1 hisobda mag'lubiyatga uchratdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Franciya Italiyanı 3:1 esabında jeńip shıqtı.

definition: Failure to win a competition or to succeed in doing something
example_in_english: England suffered a 2-0 defeat.
example_in_uzbek: Angliya 2-0 hisobida mag'lub bo'ldi
example_in_karakalpak: Angliya 2:0 esabında jeńildi.

definition: Enjoyable or interesting
example_in_english: I saw a really entertaining programme on TV last night.
example_in_uzbek: Men kecha tunda televizorda juda qiziqarli bir dastur ko'rdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men keshe túnde televizorda júdá qızıqlı bir kórsetiw kórdim.

definition: Traditional music from a particular country or region, or music played in a traditional style
example_in_english: What I like about folk music is the sound of the guitar.
example_in_uzbek: Milliy musiqaning menga yoqadigan jihati bu gitara sadosi.
example_in_karakalpak: Milliy muzikanıń maǵan unaytuǵın tárepi - bul gitara sesti.

definition: A room or club with equipment for doing physical exercises
example_in_english: My brother has got his own group and they play in our local area.
example_in_uzbek: Akam o'z guruhiga ega va ular bizning mahalliy hududda ijro etishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Aǵam óz toparına ie hám olar biziń jergilikli aymaqta atqaradı.

definition: A room or club with equipment for doing physical exercises
example_in_english: I'm thinking of joining a gym.
example_in_uzbek: Men sport zaliga qo'shilish haqida o'ylayapman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men sport zalına qosılıw haqqında oylap atırman.

definition: Get enjoyment from an activity that is not important or serious
example_in_english: We haven't had such fun for years.
example_in_uzbek: Ancha yildan beri, bunchalik xursandchilik qilmagandik.
example_in_karakalpak: Kóp jıllardan beri, bunshelli kewilli bolmaǵan edik.

definition: To make someone want to know about or take part in something
example_in_english: Photography has always interested me.
example_in_uzbek: Fotograflik meni doim qiziqtirib kelgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Fotografiyalıq meni bárqulla qızıqtırıp kelgen.

definition: An activity that you enjoy doing when you are not working
example_in_english: Tell us about your interests and hobbies.
example_in_uzbek: Qiziqishlaringiz va sevimli mashg'ulotlaringiz haqida bizga aytib bering.
example_in_karakalpak: Qızıgıwshılıǵıńız hám súyikli islerińiz haqqında bizge aytıp beriń.

definition: Someone who belongs to a group or an organisation
example_in_english: Are you a member of the golf club?
example_in_uzbek: Siz golf klubi a'zosimisiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz golf klubınıń aǵzasız ba?

definition: Someone who is competing against you
example_in_english: His opponent received only 36 percent of the vote.
example_in_uzbek: Uning raqibi ovozlarning bor yo'g'i 36 foizini oldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń qarsılası dawıslardıń tek ǵana 36 procentin aldı.

definition: To prepare or arrange an activity or event
example_in_english: Who's organising the conference?
example_in_uzbek: Konferensiyani kim tashkillashtiryapti?
example_in_karakalpak: Konferenciyanı kim shólkemlestirip atır?

definition: A feeling of happiness, enjoyment, or satisfaction
example_in_english: Rick smiled with pleasure when Michonne walked in.
example_in_uzbek: Mishon kirib kelganida, Rik mamnuniyat bilan jilmaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Mishon kirip kelgende, Rik kewilli túrde kulimsiredi.

definition: Someone whose job is to make sure that players in a game obey the rules
example_in_english: The referee blew his whistle and the game began.
example_in_uzbek: Hakam hushtagini chaldi va o'yin boshlandi.
example_in_karakalpak: Tóreshi ısqırdı hám oyın baslandı.

definition: A regular pattern of sounds in music
example_in_english: This song has got a really great rhythm.
example_in_uzbek: Bu qo'shiq judayam ajoyib ritmga ega.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul qosıq júdá ájayıp ırǵaqqa ie.

definition: To do something although you know that something bad could happen as a result
example_in_english: He risked a lot of money on the company.
example_in_uzbek: U kompaniya uchun katta pul tikdi
example_in_karakalpak: Ol kompaniya ushın úlken pul tikti.

definition: The possibility that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen
example_in_english: There's a serious risk of an accident on the road.
example_in_uzbek: Ushbu mashina yo'lida jiddiy avariya bo'lish xavfi mavjud.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul mashina jolında awır avariya bolıw qáwpi bar.

definition: To get a point in a game or sport
example_in_english: No one scored in the first half.
example_in_uzbek: O'yinning birinchi yarmida hech kim go'l urmadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Oyınnıń birinshi yarımında hesh kim gol urmadı.

definition: The number of points that someone gains in a game or test
example_in_english: The final score was 4-3 to United.
example_in_uzbek: Yakuniy hisob Yunayted foydasiga 4-3 bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Juwmaqlawshı esap YUnayted paydasına 4-3 boldı.

definition: To like a particular sports team and always want them to win
example_in_english: I support West Ham—who do you support?
example_in_uzbek: Men Vest Hem jamoasini qo'llab-quvvatlayman–siz kimni qo'llab-quvvatlaysiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Men Vest Xem komandasın qollap-quwatlayman – siz kimdi qollap-quwatlaysız?

definition: Help that you give to a particular idea, organisation, etc
example_in_english: Her family and friends have given her lots of support.
example_in_uzbek: Uning oilasi va do'stlari unga juda ko'p madad berishgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń shańaraǵı hám dosları oǵan júdá kóp járdem bergen.

definition: A group of people who play a sport or game against another group
example_in_english: Are you in the hockey team this year?
example_in_uzbek: Siz bu yil hokkey guruhidamisiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz bıyıl xokkey toparında bolasız ba?

definition: To practise a sport regularly before a match or competition
example_in_english: The players train five days a week.
example_in_uzbek: O'yinchilar haftada 5 kun shug'ullanishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Oyınshılar háptede 5 kún shuģıllanadı.

definition: A game in which players use electronic controls to move images on a television or computer screen
example_in_english: I don't like video games—I'd rather play outside.
example_in_uzbek: Menga video o'yinlar yoqmaydi–ko'chada o'ynashni afzal ko'raman.
example_in_karakalpak: Maǵan video oyınlar unamaydı – kóshede oynawdı abzal kóremen.

definition: To succeed in doing or having something
example_in_english: We've achieved what we wanted to do.
example_in_uzbek: Qilishni xohlagan narsamizga erishdik.
example_in_karakalpak: Qılmaqshı bolǵan nársesine eristik.

definition: The organ inside your head that allows you to think and feel, and controls your body
example_in_english: The illness had affected his brain.
example_in_uzbek: Kasallik uning miyasiga ta'sir qilgan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kesellik onıń miyine tásir etken edi.

definition: Good at learning or understanding things
example_in_english: I'd like to be a doctor, but I'm not clever enough.
example_in_uzbek: Men shifokor bo'lishni istardim, ammo yetarlicha aqlli emasman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men shıpaker bolıwdı qáler edim, biraq jeterlishe aqıllı emespen.

definition: To give all your attention to the thing that you are doing
example_in_english: Just concentrate on your work.
example_in_uzbek: Shunchaki fikringizni ishga qarating.
example_in_karakalpak: Tek ǵana pikirińizdi jumısqa qaratıń.

definition: To think about something carefully before you make a decision
example_in_english: At one time I seriously considered leaving.
example_in_uzbek: Bir vaqtlar men ketishni jiddiy o'ylab ko'rganman.
example_in_karakalpak: Bir waqıtları men ketiwdi qattı oylaǵan edim.

definition: A series of lessons in an academic subject or a practical skill
example_in_english: You could do a language course abroad.
example_in_uzbek: Siz chet elda til kursini o'tashingiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz shet elde til kursın ótewińiz múmkin.

definition: A course of study at a university, or the qualification that you get after completing the course
example_in_english: She's doing a degree at Exeter University.
example_in_uzbek: U Exeter Universitetida (ma'lum bir yo'nalishda) tahsil oladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol Exeter universitetinde (belgili bir baǵdarda) oqıydı.

definition: If you experience a problem or situation, you have that problem or are in that situation
example_in_english: I'd love to experience being in a submarine.
example_in_uzbek: Men suv osti kemasida bo'lib ko'rishni istardim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men suw astı kemesinde bolıp kóriwdi qáler edim.

definition: Knowledge and skill that you get by doing a particular job or activity
example_in_english: Do you have any previous experience with children?
example_in_uzbek: Sizda bolalar bilan ishlash bo'yicha tajriba bormi?
example_in_karakalpak: Sizde balalar menen islesiw boyınsha tájiriybe bar ma?

definition: Someone who has a particular skill or knows a lot about a particular subject
example_in_english: She's a computer expert.
example_in_uzbek: U kompyuter mutaxassisi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol kompyuter qánigesi.

definition: Having special skills in or knowledge about something
example_in_english: He's an expert painter.
example_in_uzbek: U usta rassom.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol sheber xudojnik.

definition: To be unsuccessful in something
example_in_english: He failed the maths exam.
example_in_uzbek: U matematika imtihonidan yiqildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol matematika imtixanınan jıǵıldı.

definition: To say or decide what you think is true, without being certain about it
example_in_english: Whoever guesses correctly will win two tickets to the show.
example_in_uzbek: Kimda-kim to'g'ri taxmin qilsa, shouga 2 ta chipta yutib oladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kimde-kim durıs boljaw jasasa, shouǵa 2 bilet utıp aladı.

definition: An occasion when you say what you think is true without being certain
example_in_english: Have a guess and then check it on your calculator.
example_in_uzbek: Taxmin qilib ko'ring va so'ng kalkulyatoringizda tekshirib ko'ring.
example_in_karakalpak: Shamalap kóriń hám keyin kalkulyatorińızda tekserip kóriń.

definition: To pause before doing something because you are nervous or not certain about it
example_in_english: He hesitated for a moment and then knocked on the door.
example_in_uzbek: U biroz muddat ikkilandi va so'ng eshikni taqillatdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol biraz eglenip turdı da, soń esikti qaqtı.

definition: A statement of something that must be done, or an explanation of how to do or use something
example_in_english: I tried to follow her instructions, but I got confused.
example_in_uzbek: Uning ko'rsatmalariga amal qilishga harakat qildim, lekin dovdirab qoldim (chalkashib ketdim).
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń kórsetpelerine ámel etiwge háreket ettim, biraq albırap qaldım.

definition: To develop or improve
example_in_english: My guitar teacher says I'm making a lot of progress.
example_in_uzbek: Gitara o'qituvchimning aytishicha, men juda ham yaxshilanyapman.
example_in_karakalpak: Gitara oqıtıwshımnıń aytıwınsha, men júdá jaqsılanıp atırman.

definition: To check something, so that you can be sure about it
example_in_english: I just wanted to make sure you knew where to go.
example_in_uzbek: Men shunchaki qayerga borish kerakligini bilishingizga ishonch hosil qilishni xohlagandim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men tek qay jerge barıw kerekligin biliwińizge isenim payda qılmaqshı edim.

definition: To judge the quality of a student's work and write a mark on it
example_in_english: I spent the evening marking essays.
example_in_uzbek: Men oqshomni insholarni baholab o'tkazdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men aqshamdı shıǵarmalardı bahalap ótkerdim.

definition: A score or grade that you are given for school work or for how you perform in a competition
example_in_english: What mark did you get for your essay?
example_in_uzbek: Inshoyingiz uchun necha baho oldingiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Jumısıńız ushın neshe baha aldıńız?

definition: Existing in the mind, or relating to the mind
example_in_english: Scientists know a lot about the mental development of children.
example_in_uzbek: Olimlar bolalarning aqliy rivojlanishi to'g'risida ko'p narsalarni bilishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ilimpazlar balalardıń aqılıy rawajlanıwı haqqında kóp nárselerdi biledi.

definition: To be successful in an examination or test
example_in_english: She passed her driving test.
example_in_uzbek: U haydovchilik imtihonidan o'tdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol aydawshılıq imtixanın tapsırdı.

definition: Something such as a degree or a diploma that you get when you successfully finish a course of study
example_in_english: Simon left school with no qualifications.
example_in_uzbek: Saymon maktabni hech qanday malakasiz tark etdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Sayman mektepten hesh qanday mamanlıqsız shıqtı.

definition: To help someone to remember something
example_in_english: Remind Jenny to bring my CD when she comes.
example_in_uzbek: Jeni kelganida mening diskimni olib kelishini eslating.
example_in_karakalpak: Jeni kelgende meniń diskimdi alıp keliwin eskertin.

definition: A spoken or written description of a particular subject, situation, or event
example_in_english: We have to write a short report on the conference.
example_in_uzbek: Biz konferensiya to'g'risida kichik bir hisobot yozishimiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz konferenciya haqqında kishi bir bayanat jazıwımız kerek.

definition: To study your notes and information again in order to prepare for an examination
example_in_english: I've got a test tomorrow, so I have to revise tonight.
example_in_uzbek: Ertaga imtihonim bor, shuning uchun bu kecha takrorlashim kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Erteń imtixanım bar, sonıń ushın búgin túnde tákirarlawım kerek.

definition: To try to find something or someone by looking carefully
example_in_english: After three days searching, I gave up.
example_in_uzbek: 3 kun izlaganimdan so'ng, taslim bo'ldim (to'xtatdim).
example_in_karakalpak: 3 kún izlegennen soń, táslim boldım (toqtattım).

definition: An attempt to find something
example_in_english: The police have carried out an extensive search of the area.
example_in_uzbek: Politsiya hududda keng qamrovli qidiruv ishlarini olib bordi.
example_in_karakalpak: Polisiya aymaqta keń kólemli izlew jumısların alıp bardı.

definition: The ability to do something well, usually as a result of experience and training
example_in_english: Being a doctor demands a lot of skill.
example_in_uzbek: Shifokor bo'lish ulkan mahorat talab qiladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Shıpaker bolıw úlken sheberlikti talap etedi.

definition: Intelligent
example_in_english: Sophie is a very smart student.
example_in_uzbek: Sofi juda aqlli o'quvchi.
example_in_karakalpak: Sofi júdá aqıllı oqıwshı.

definition: Something that you learn or teach at a school, for example English, mathematics, or biology
example_in_english: What's your favourite subject?
example_in_uzbek: Sevimli faningiz qaysi?
example_in_karakalpak: Súyikli pániniz qaysi?

definition: To have an important test
example_in_english: I'm taking the exam in June.
example_in_uzbek: Imtihonni iyunda topshiraman.
example_in_karakalpak: Imtixandı iyunda tapsıraman.

definition: Very good at something
example_in_english: She's a talented singer.
example_in_uzbek: U qobiliyatli qo'shiqchi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol talantlı qosıqshı.

definition: One of the periods of time that the year is divided into for students
example_in_english: How many weeks is it till the end of term?
example_in_uzbek: Semester tugashiga necha hafta qoldi?
example_in_karakalpak: Semestr tamamlanıwına neshe hápte qaldı?

definition: To think about something because you want to know more facts
example_in_english: I was wondering about the best place for a holiday.
example_in_uzbek: Men dam olish (ta'til) uchun eng yaxshi joy haqida o'ylayotgandim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men dem alıw ushın eń jaqsı jer haqqında oylap atır edim.

definition: In or to a foreign country
example_in_english: We try to go abroad at least once a year.
example_in_uzbek: Biz yiliga eng kamida bir marta chet elga borishga harakat qilamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz jılına keminde bir márte sırt elge barıwǵa háreket etemiz.

definition: A place for someone to stay, live, or work in
example_in_english: The hotel provides accommodation for up to 100 people.
example_in_uzbek: Mehmonxona 100 tagacha odamni turar joy bilan ta'minlaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Miymanxana 100 ge shekem adamdı turaq jay menen támiyinleydi.

definition: To arrange to have or use something at a particular time in the future
example_in_english: Shall I book a room for you?
example_in_uzbek: Siz uchun xona band qilib qo'yaymi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz ushın bólme bántlep qoyayın ba?

definition: A period of time when you are not working and can rest or enjoy yourself
example_in_english: OK, let's take a fifteen-minute break.
example_in_uzbek: Okey, keling 15 daqiqalik tanaffus qilamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Okey, kelin 15 minutlıq tánepis qılayıq.

definition: To say that something that has been arranged will not now happen
example_in_english: The 4.05 train has been cancelled.
example_in_uzbek: 4.05 dagi poyezd bekor qilindi.
example_in_karakalpak: 4.05 degi poezd biykar etildi.

definition: To get on a train, bus, plane, or boat that is travelling somewhere
example_in_english: I caught the next train to London.
example_in_uzbek: Men Londonga ketayotgan keyingi poyezdga chiqdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Londonǵa baratırǵan keyingi poezdǵa mindim.

definition: A comfortable bus for long journeys
example_in_english: Let's take the coach to Brighton this weekend.
example_in_uzbek: Keling bu dam olish kunida Braytnga turistik avtobusda sayohat qilamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Keliń, bul dem alıs kúni Braytinge turistlik avtobusta sayaxat qılayıq.

definition: Easy for you to do, or suitable for your needs
example_in_english: Travelling underground is fast and convenient.
example_in_uzbek: Metro orqali borish tez va qulay.
example_in_karakalpak: Metro menen barıw tez hám qolaylı.

definition: If a vehicle crashes, or if someone crashes it, it hits something
example_in_english: Three people were killed when their car crashed into a tree.
example_in_uzbek: Mashinalari daraxtga urilgan paytda, 3 kishi o'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Mashinaları terekke urılǵan waqıtta, 3 adam qaytıs boldı.

definition: An accident that happens when a vehicle hits something
example_in_english: He was seriously injured in a car crash.
example_in_uzbek: U avtohalokatda jiddiy jarohat oldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol avtoavariyada awır jaraqat aldı.

definition: Containing a lot of people or things
example_in_english: Was the pool crowded?
example_in_uzbek: Basseyn tiqilinchmidi? (=Basseynda odam ko'pmidi?)
example_in_karakalpak: Basseyn tıǵılıspa edi? (=Basseynde adam kóp pe edi?)

definition: A journey on a ship for pleasure, often visiting a series of places
example_in_english: I would love to go on a cruise round the Mediterranean.
example_in_uzbek: Men O'rta Yer dengizi bo'ylab dengiz sayohatiga chiqishni istardim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Jer Orta teńizi boylap teńiz sayaxatına shıǵıwdı qáler edim.

definition: To do something later than is planned or expected
example_in_english: They delayed the decision for as long as possible.
example_in_uzbek: Ular qarorni iloji boricha uzoqroq vaqtga kechiktirishdi (=Bir qaror qabul qilishmadi).
example_in_karakalpak: Olar qarardı ilajı barınsha kóbirek waqıtqa keshiktirdi (=Bir qarar qabıl etpedi).

definition: A situation in which something happens later or more slowly than you expected
example_in_english: After a long delay, the plane finally took off.
example_in_uzbek: Uzoq kechikishdan so'ng, samalyot nihoyat havoga ko'tarildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Uzaq keshigiwden keyin, samolyot aqırında hawaǵa kóterildi.

definition: The place where someone or something is going
example_in_english: After eight hours on the road, we finally reached our destination.
example_in_uzbek: 8 soat yo'lda yurgandan so'ng, biz nihoyat manzilimizga yetib bordik.
example_in_karakalpak: 8 saat jol júrgennen soń, biz aqırında mánzilge jetip keldik.

definition: A boat that makes short regular journeys between two or more places
example_in_english: They took the ferry to Dover.
example_in_uzbek: Ular Doverga ketadigan qayiqqa chiqishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Olar Doverge ketetuǵın qayıqqa mindi.

definition: A journey in a plane
example_in_english: The flight from New York to Heathrow took about five hours.
example_in_uzbek: Nyu Yorkdan Hizrovga bo'lgan parvoz 5 soat oldi (5 soat davom etdi).
example_in_karakalpak: Nyu-Yorktan Xizrovqa bolgan párwaz 5 saat aldı (5 saat dawam etti).

definition: From another country, or in another country
example_in_english: Do you speak any foreign languages?
example_in_uzbek: Qandaydir chet tilida gaplasha olasizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Qanday da bir shet tilinde sóylese alasız ba?

definition: An area of water next to the land where boats can stop
example_in_english: There were about twenty boats in the harbour.
example_in_uzbek: Bandargohda taxminan 20 ta qayiq bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Portta shama menen 20 qayıq bar edi.

definition: An occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance
example_in_english: We had a long journey ahead of us.
example_in_uzbek: Oldinda bizni uzoq sayohat kutib turardi.
example_in_karakalpak: Aldımızda bizdi uzaq sayaxat kútip tur edi.

definition: Bags and suitcases that you take on a journey
example_in_english: We have to get our luggage when we get off the plane.
example_in_uzbek: Samalyotdan tushganimizda yuklarimizni olishimiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Samolyottan túskende júklerimizdi alıwımız kerek.

definition: A nearby place is not far away
example_in_english: Let's go to a nearby restaurant, shall we?
example_in_uzbek: Yaqin atrofdagi restoranga boramizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Jaqın jerdegi restoranǵa baramız ba?

definition: Not far from where you are
example_in_english: My cousin lives nearby.
example_in_uzbek: Mening qarindoshim shu yaqin atrofda yashaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń tuwısqanım jaqın jerde jasaydı.

definition: To put your things into a bag, case, or box so that you can take or send them somewhere
example_in_english: He was still packing his suitcase when the taxi came.
example_in_uzbek: Taksi kelganda, u hamon chamadonini yig‘ishtirib o‘tirgan edi (chamadoniga kiyimlarini joylab).
example_in_karakalpak: Taksi kelgende, ol ele chemodanın jıynastırıp otır edi (chemodanına kiyimlerin salıp).

definition: An official document that contains your photograph and shows which country you are a citizen of
example_in_english: Bill has a Canadian passport.
example_in_uzbek: Bizda Kanada pasporti bor.
example_in_karakalpak: Bizde Kanada pasportı bar.

definition: An area next to a railway track where passengers get onto and off trains
example_in_english: The train to Brussels will depart from platform 3.
example_in_uzbek: Braselsga ketayotgan poyezd 3-platformadan jo'naydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Braselsga ketayotgan poyezd 3-platformadan jönaydi.

definition: The system that is used for travelling or for moving goods from one place to another
example_in_english: Auckland's public transport system is excellent.
example_in_uzbek: Oklend shahrining jamoat transport tizimi a'lo darajada.
example_in_karakalpak: Oklend qalasınıń jámietlik transport sisteması joqarı dárejede.

definition: To arrive somewhere
example_in_english: We hoped to reach the camp before dark.
example_in_uzbek: Lagerga qorong'u tushishdan avval yetib borishga umid qilgandik.
example_in_karakalpak: Lagerge qarańǵı túsiwden aldın jetip barıwǵa úmit etken edik.

definition: A place where people go for a holiday
example_in_english: We stayed in a lovely ski resort.
example_in_uzbek: Biz ajoyib chang'i kurortida tunadik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz ajoyib chanǵi kurortida tunadik.

definition: Something that you buy to remind you of a place that you visited on holiday or of a special event
example_in_english: This T-shirt with Big Ben on it will make a great souvenir.
example_in_uzbek: Big Ben tasvirlangan bu futbolka ajoyib suviner bo'ladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Big Ben tasvirlangan bu futbolka ajoyib suviner bóladi.

definition: The vehicles that are travelling in an area at a particular time
example_in_english: At that time of night, there was no traffic on the roads.
example_in_uzbek: Tunning o‘sha paytida, yo‘llarda hech qanday transport qatnovi yo‘q edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Túnniń sol payıtında, jollarda hesh qanday transport qatnawı joq edi.

definition: An occasion when you go somewhere and come back again
example_in_english: The whole family went on a trip to Florida.
example_in_uzbek: Butun oila Floridaga sayohatga ketishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Butun oila Floridaga sayohatga ketishdi.

definition: A machine that you travel in or on, especially one with an engine that travels on roads, for example a car, bus, etc
example_in_english: Four vehicles were involved in the accident.
example_in_uzbek: Avariyada 4 ta transport vositasi qatnashgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Avariyada 4 transport quralı qatnasqan.

definition: To tell someone that you are sorry for doing something wrong
example_in_english: You should apologise to your brother.
example_in_uzbek: Akangizdan kechirim so'rashingiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Akangizdan kechirim sórashingiz kerak.

definition: A man or boy that you are having a romantic relationship with
example_in_english: She's got a new boyfriend.
example_in_uzbek: Uning yangi yigiti bor.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń jańa jigiti bar.

definition: Connected by shared feelings such as love and respect
example_in_english: My brother and I are very close.
example_in_uzbek: Akam bilan men juda yaqinmiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Akam bilan men juda yaqinmiz.

definition: Certain about your abilities and not nervous or frightened
example_in_english: I was starting to feel more confident about the exam.
example_in_uzbek: Imtihonga nisbatan o‘zimni yanada dadil his qila boshladim.
example_in_karakalpak: Imtihonga nisbatan ózimni yanada dadil his qila boshladim.

definition: A cool person is one that you like or admire, or is very fashionable
example_in_english: Jake is really cool.
example_in_uzbek: Jake juda ham ajoyib!
example_in_karakalpak: Jake juda ham ajoyib!

definition: Two people who are married to each other, or who have a romantic relationship with each other
example_in_english: Bill and Melissa make a great couple.
example_in_uzbek: Bil va Melisa juda zo'r juftlik bo'lishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bil va Melisa juda zör juftlik bólishadi.

definition: To put new paint or paper on the walls of a room
example_in_english: We decorated the kitchen last weekend.
example_in_uzbek: O'tgan hafta biz oshxonani bezatdik.
example_in_karakalpak: Ótgan hafta biz oshxonani bezatdik.

definition: To say things to support someone or something
example_in_english: We will defend their right to free speech.
example_in_uzbek: Biz ularning so'z erkinligi huquqini himoya qilamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz ularning sóz erkinligi huquqini himoya qilamiz.

definition: No longer married because your marriage has been legally ended
example_in_english: After they got divorced, she never remarried.
example_in_uzbek: Ular ajrashishgandan so'ng, u hech qachon qayta turmush qurmadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Olar ajrashishgandan sóng, u hech qachon qayta turmush qurmadi.

definition: A set of rooms for living in, usually on one floor of a large building
example_in_english: The family live in a fourth-floor flat.
example_in_uzbek: Oila to'rtinchi qavatdagi kvartirada yashaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Semya jivet v kvartire na chetvertom etaje.

definition: Giving people more of your time or money than is usual or expected
example_in_english: She is a warm and generous human being.
example_in_uzbek: U samimiy va sahiy inson.
example_in_karakalpak: U samimiy va sahiy inson.

definition: A girl or woman that you are having a romantic relationship with
example_in_english: Have you got a girlfriend?
example_in_uzbek: Uchrashib yuradigan yoqtirgan qizingiz bormi?
example_in_karakalpak: Uchrashib yuradigan yoqtirgan qizingiz bormi?

definition: The feeling that you want to thank someone because they have given you something or done something for you
example_in_english: Thanks for coming with me. I'm really grateful.
example_in_uzbek: Men bilan birga kelganingiz uchun rahmat. Juda ham minnatdorman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men bilan birga kelganingiz uchun rahmat. Juda ham minnatdorman.

definition: Someone that you have invited to your home or your party
example_in_english: He was a guest at our wedding.
example_in_uzbek: U to'yimizda mehmon bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol toyımızda miyman boldı.

definition: Not depending on other people
example_in_english: Michelle is young, independent and confident.
example_in_uzbek: Mishel yosh, mustaqil va dadil.
example_in_karakalpak: Mishel jas, erkin hám jigerli.

definition: To tell someone another person's name when they meet for the first time
example_in_english: I'd like to introduce you to my friend Martin.
example_in_uzbek: Sizni do'stim Martinga tanishtirmoqchiman.
example_in_karakalpak: Sizdi dostım Martin menen tanıstırmaqshıman.

definition: Feeling or showing love
example_in_english: Cats are really loving animals.
example_in_uzbek: Mushuklar juda mehribon hayvonlardir.
example_in_karakalpak: Pıshıqlar júdá mehriban haywanlar.

definition: Someone who is loyal continues to support a person or organization, or idea in difficult times
example_in_english: These are people who have remained loyal to the company for years.
example_in_uzbek: Bular kompaniyaga uzoq yillardan beri sodiq qolib kelayotgan odamlar.
example_in_karakalpak: Bular kompaniyaǵa uzaq jıllardan berli sadıq qalıp kiyatırǵan adamlar.

definition: The way that someone is feeling, or the way that a group of people is feeling at a particular time
example_in_english: I had never seen Ann in such a good mood before.
example_in_uzbek: Men Anni avval hech qachon bunchalar yaxshi kayfiyatda ko'rmagandim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Annin hesh qashan bunshelli jaqsı keypiyatta kórmegen edim.

definition: A particular area of a town
example_in_english: We live in a quiet neighbourhood.
example_in_uzbek: Biz tinch mahallada yashaymiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz tınısh máhállede jasaymız.

definition: Normal or average, and not unusual or special
example_in_english: It was just an ordinary Saturday morning.
example_in_uzbek: U shunchaki odatiy bir shanba tongi edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul ápiwayı bir shembi tańı edi.

definition: Someone who is patient is able to wait for a long time or deal with a difficult situation without becoming angry or upset
example_in_english: Susan is very patient with the children.
example_in_uzbek: Syusen bu bolalar bilan juda sabrli.
example_in_karakalpak: Syuzen bul balalar menen júdá sabırlı.

definition: A private person does not talk to other people about their personal life or feelings
example_in_english: Damian is a very private person.
example_in_uzbek: Demiyen shaxsiy hayoti yoki tuyg'ulari to'g'risida gapirmaydigan inson.
example_in_karakalpak: Demien jeke turmısı yamasa sezimleri haqqında sóylemeytuǵın insan.

definition: To know someone or something because you have seen, heard, or met them before
example_in_english: I thought I recognised your voice!
example_in_uzbek: Ovozingizni tanidim deb o'ylagandim!
example_in_karakalpak: Dawısıńızdı tanıdım dep edim!

definition: A member of your family
example_in_english: All our relations are coming to the party.
example_in_uzbek: Bizning hamma qarindoshlarimiz bazmga kelishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Biziń hámme tuwısqanlarımız bázimge keledi.

definition: To pay money regularly to use a house, room, office, etc that belongs to someone else
example_in_english: How long have you been renting this place?
example_in_uzbek: Bu yerda qancha vaqtdan beri ijaradasiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jerde qansha waqıttan berli ijaradasańız?

definition: An amount of money that you pay regularly for using a house, room, office, etc that belongs to someone else
example_in_english: After she'd paid her rent, Jan had no money left for food.
example_in_uzbek: Ijara pulini to'laganidan so'ng, Jenning ovqat uchun hech qanday puli qolmadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ijara pulın tólegennen keyin, Jenniń awqat ushın hesh qanday aqshası qalmadı.

definition: To treat someone in a way that shows that you think they are important and should be admired
example_in_english: People will respect you for telling the truth.
example_in_uzbek: Odamlar haqiqatni gapirganingiz uchun hurmat qilishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Adamlar haqıyqatlıqtı aytqanıńız ushın húrmet etedi.

definition: The attitude that someone is important and should be admired, and that you should treat them politely
example_in_english: She's worked hard to gain the respect of her colleagues.
example_in_uzbek: U hamkasblarining hurmatini qozonish uchun qattiq harakat qildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol kásiplesleriniń húrmetine erisiw ushın qattı háreket etti.

definition: Not married, or not in a romantic relationship
example_in_english: Please state whether you are single, married, or divorced.
example_in_uzbek: Iltimos, turmush qurmagan, qurgan yoki ajrashganligingizni bildiring.
example_in_karakalpak: Iltimas, turmıs qurmaǵanıńız, úylengen yaki ajırasqanıńızdı bildiriń.

definition: Someone who you do not know
example_in_english: I didn't want to share a room with a complete stranger.
example_in_uzbek: Men umuman notanish kimsa bilan bir xonada turishni xohlamadim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men ulıwma biytanıs adam menen bir bólmede turǵım kelmedi.

definition: To believe that someone or something is good, honest, or reliable
example_in_english: You can trust Dana.
example_in_uzbek: Danaga ishonsangiz bo'ladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Danaǵa isene berseńiz boladı.

definition: A feeling that you trust someone or something
example_in_english: The doctor-patient relationship has to be based on trust.
example_in_uzbek: Shifokor va bemor o'rtasidagi aloqa ishonchga asoslangan bo'lishi kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Shıpaker hám nawqas arasındaǵı baylanıs isenimge tiykarlanǵan bolıwı kerek.

definition: An announcement in a newspaper, on television, on the internet, etc that is designed to persuade people to buy a product or service, go to an event, or apply for a job
example_in_english: I saw an advertisement for a new kind of camera.
example_in_uzbek: Men yangi turdagi kameraning reklamasini ko'rdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men jańa túrdegi kameranıń reklamasın kórdim.

definition: To have enough money to pay for something
example_in_english: I'm not sure how they're able to afford such expensive holidays.
example_in_uzbek: Bunaqangi qimmat dam olishlarga qanday qilib pullari yetishini bilmayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Bunday qımbat dem alıslarǵa qalay pulı jetetuǵının bilmeymen.

definition: Something you buy that costs much less than normal
example_in_english: Her dress was a real bargain.
example_in_uzbek: Uning ko'ylagi haqiqiy chegirmadagi mahsulot edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń kóylegi haqıyqıy shegirmedegi ónim edi.

definition: A product or group of products that has its own name and is made by one particular company
example_in_english: I tried using a new brand of soap.
example_in_uzbek: Yangi brenddagi sovunni ishlatib ko'rdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Jańa markadaǵı sabındı islep kórdim.

definition: A book that contains pictures of things that you can buy
example_in_english: Do you have a catalogue with all your products in it?
example_in_uzbek: Hamma mahsulotingizni o'z ichiga jamlagan katalogingiz bormi?
example_in_karakalpak: Barlıq ónimlerińizdi óz ishine alǵan katalogıńız bar ma?

definition: Coins rather than notes
example_in_english: I'm sorry, I haven't got any change.
example_in_uzbek: Uzr, lekin tangam yo'q edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Keshirersiz, biraq teńgem joq edi.

definition: A flat round piece of metal used as money
example_in_english: Put a coin into the slot.
example_in_uzbek: Tirqishga tanga soling.
example_in_karakalpak: Sańlaqqa tenge salıń.

definition: If something costs an amount of money, you need that amount to pay for it or to do it
example_in_english: A new computer costs around €1,000.
example_in_uzbek: Yangi kompyuter taxminan 1,000 yevro turadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Jańa kompyuter shama menen 1000 evro turadi.

definition: The amount of money that you need in order to buy something or to do something
example_in_english: What's the total cost of these three pairs of shoes?
example_in_uzbek: Mana bu 3 juft oyoq kiyimning umumiy narxi qancha?
example_in_karakalpak: Mina 3 jup ayaq kiyimniń uliwma bahası qansha?

definition: A person or company that buys goods or services
example_in_english: Supermarkets use a variety of ways to attract customers.
example_in_uzbek: Xaridorlarni jalb qilish uchun supermarketlar turli-tuman yo'llardan foydalanishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Qarıydarlardı tartıw ushın supermarketler hár qıylı jollardan paydalanadı.

definition: An amount of money that you owe
example_in_english: By this time we had debts of over €15,000.
example_in_uzbek: Bu paytgacha, 15,000 yevrodan ziyod qarzimiz bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Usı waqıtqa shekem, 15 000 evrodan aslam qarızımız bar edi.

definition: To say strongly that you want something
example_in_english: The teacher demanded an explanation for all the water on the floor.
example_in_uzbek: O'qituvchi poldagi suv uchun izoh talab qildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Muǵallim poldaǵı suw ushın túsinik talap etti.

definition: To send a product to another country so that it can be sold there
example_in_english: Their flowers are exported around the world.
example_in_uzbek: Ularning gullari dunyo bo'ylab eksport qilinadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Olardıń gúlleri dúnya boylap eksport etiledi.

definition: Money that you pay to a professional person or institution for their work
example_in_english: He will have to pay school fees of €2,000.
example_in_uzbek: U 2,000 yevro maktab haqini to'lashiga to'g'ri keladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol 2000 evro mektep haqısın tólewine tuwra keledi.

definition: A large amount of money
example_in_english: They must have spent a fortune on flowers.
example_in_uzbek: Gullar uchun ancha ko'p pul sarflashgan bo'lishsa kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Gúller ushın ádeuir kóp pul jumsaǵan bolıwı kerek.

definition: To buy a product from another country and bring it to your country
example_in_english: We import most of our coal from other countries.
example_in_uzbek: Ko'mirning katta qismini boshqa davlatlardan import qilamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Kómirdiń úlken bólegin basqa mámleketlerden import etemiz.

definition: To use your money with the aim of making a profit from it
example_in_english: Banks invested €20 million in the scheme.
example_in_uzbek: Banklar ushbu loyihaga 20 million yevro sarmoya kiritishgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Bankler bul joybarǵa 20 million evro investiciya kirgizgen.

definition: To get something that you want or need
example_in_english: She has to obtain her father's permission before she does anything.
example_in_uzbek: Qandaydir ish qilishdan avval, u otasining ijozatini olishiga to'g'ri keladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Qanday da bir jumıs islewden aldın, ol ákesiniń ruqsatın alıwǵa tuwra keledi.

definition: To have to give someone a particular amount of money because you have bought something or have borrowed money from them
example_in_english: Pam still owes me €5.
example_in_uzbek: Pam haliyam mendan 5 yevro qarz.
example_in_karakalpak: Pam ele de mennen 5 evro qarız.

definition: To legally have something, especially because you have bought it
example_in_english: Who owns that house by the lake?
example_in_uzbek: Ko'l bo'yidagi uyga kim egalik qiladi?
example_in_karakalpak: Kól boyındaǵı jayǵa kim ielik etedi?

definition: Money that you get when you sell something for a price that is higher than the cost of making it or buying it
example_in_english: Investors have made a 14 percent profit in just three months.
example_in_uzbek: Sarmoyachilar bor yo'g'i 3 oyda 14% foyda ko'rdilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Investorlar bar-joǵi 3 ayda 14% payda kórdi.

definition: The things that you own
example_in_english: The books are my personal property.
example_in_uzbek: Kitoblar mening shaxsiy mulkim.
example_in_karakalpak: Kitaplar meniń jeke múlkim.

definition: To buy something
example_in_english: She purchased a new lamp for her bedroom.
example_in_uzbek: U yotoqxonasi uchun yangi lampa sotib oldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol jataqxanası ushın jańa lampa satıp aldı.

definition: Something that you buy
example_in_english: Her latest purchase was a long black coat.
example_in_uzbek: Uning oxirgi xaridi uzun qora palto edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń sońǵı satıp alǵanı uzın qara palto edi.

definition: A document that you get from someone showing that you have given them money or goods
example_in_english: Make sure you get a receipt for the taxi.
example_in_uzbek: Taksi uchun chekni olishni unutmang.
example_in_karakalpak: Taksi ushın chekti alıwdı umıtpań.

definition: To need someone or something
example_in_english: Working with these children requires a great deal of patience.
example_in_uzbek: Bu bolalar bilan ishlash ulkan sabr-matonat talab qiladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul balalar menen islesiw úlken sabır-taqat talap etedi.

definition: An event or period of time during which a shop reduces the prices of some of its goods
example_in_english: The Easter sales start tomorrow.
example_in_uzbek: Pasxa bayrami chegirmalari ertaga boshlanadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Pasxa bayramı shegirmeleri erteń baslanadı.

definition: To regularly put money in a bank, or to invest it so that you can use it later
example_in_english: Don't wait until you're 40 to start saving for retirement.
example_in_uzbek: Nafaqa payti uchun pul jamg'arishni 40 yoshga to'lgunga qadar kutmang.
example_in_karakalpak: Pensiya waqtı ushın pul jıynawdı 40 jasqa tolǵanǵa shekem kútpeń.

definition: To choose someone or something from a group
example_in_english: You can select one of four colors.
example_in_uzbek: 4 ta rangdan birini tanlashingiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: 4 reńnen birin tańlawınız múmkin.

definition: To provide someone or something with something that they need or want
example_in_english: Our shop supplies things to people all over the country.
example_in_uzbek: Bizning do'konimiz butun mamlakat bo'ylab odamlarga narsalar ta'minlaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Biziń dúkanımız pútkil mámleket boylap adamlarǵa zatlar jetkerip beredi.

definition: An amount or quantity of something that is available to use
example_in_english: We have a good supply of fresh water here.
example_in_uzbek: Bu yerda toza suvning katta ta'minoti bor.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jerde taza suwdıń úlken támiynatı bar.

definition: A number of different people or things
example_in_english: Adults study for a variety of reasons.
example_in_uzbek: Kattalar turli-tuman sabablarga ko'ra o'qishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Úlkenler hár qıylı sebeplerge kóre oqıydı.

definition: To use more of something than is necessary, or to use it in a way that does not produce the best results
example_in_english: Don't waste water like that—turn the tap off when you're not using it!
example_in_uzbek: Suvni bunaqangi isrof qilmang–ishlatmayotganizgizda jo'mrakni o'chirib qo'ying!
example_in_karakalpak: Suwdı bunday ısırap etpey atırǵan waqtıńızda kranıńızdı óshiriń!

definition: The failure to use something that is valuable or useful in an effective way
example_in_english: All this uneaten food—what a waste!
example_in_uzbek: Bu yeyilmagan ovqatlarning bari–qanchalar isrofgarchilik a!
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jelinbegen awqatlardıń hámmesi qanshelli ısırapgershilik!

definition: Not natural or real, but made by people
example_in_english: There was a vase of artificial flowers on the table.
example_in_uzbek: Stol ustida sun'iy gullar bilan vaz bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Stol ústinde jasalma gúller menen salmaq bar edi.

definition: An automatic machine can work by itself without being operated by people
example_in_english: It's an automatic door.
example_in_uzbek: Bu avtomatik eshik.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul avtomatikalıq esik.

definition: Difficult to do, deal with, or understand
example_in_english: This is a complicated problem.
example_in_uzbek: Bu murakkab muammo.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul quramalı mashqala.

definition: To become less
example_in_english: The number of visitors has decreased significantly.
example_in_uzbek: Mehmonlar soni sezilarli darajada kamaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Qonaqlar sanı sezilerli dárejede azaydı.

definition: The amount by which something is less
example_in_english: There's been a decrease in the number of visitors.
example_in_uzbek: Mehmonlar sonida kamayish bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Qonaqlar sanında azayıw boldı.

definition: Storing information such as sound or pictures as numbers or electronic signals
example_in_english: It's a digital recording.
example_in_uzbek: Bu raqamli yozuv.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul cifrlı jazıw.

definition: To find something that was hidden or that no one knew about before
example_in_english: William Herschel discovered Uranus in 1781.
example_in_uzbek: Uilyam Herschel Uranusni 1781 yilda kashf etdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Uilyam Gershel Urandı 1781-jılı ashqan.

definition: A change that is produced in one person or thing by another
example_in_english: Scientists are studying the chemical's effect on the environment.
example_in_uzbek: Olimlar kimyoviy moddalar ta'sirini atrof-muhitda o'rganmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Ilimpazlar ximiyalıq zatlardıń qorshaǵan ortalıqqa tásirin úyrenbekte.

definition: The tools, machines, or other things that you need for a particular job or activity
example_in_english: A computer is the most important piece of equipment you will buy.
example_in_uzbek: Kompyuter siz sotib oladigan eng muhim uskunadir.
example_in_karakalpak: Kompyuter siz satıp alatuģın eń áhmiyetli úskene.

definition: To guess or calculate an amount or value by using available information
example_in_english: It is impossible to estimate how many of the residents were affected.
example_in_uzbek: Qanchalik ko'p aholi ta'sirlanganligini baholash imkonsiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Qansha kóp xalıq tásirlengenin bahalaw múmkin emes.

definition: Done, made, or described with all the details correct
example_in_english: The exact number of people there was unknown.
example_in_uzbek: U yerda aniq odam soni ma'lum emas edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol jerdegi anıq adam sanı belgili emes edi.

definition: To perform scientific tests in order to find out what happens to someone or something in particular conditions
example_in_english: This lab does not experiment on animals.
example_in_uzbek: Ushbu laboratoriya hayvonlar ustida tajriba o'tkazmaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul laboratoriya haywanlar ústinde tájiriybe ótkermeydi.

definition: A scientific test to find out what happens to someone or something in particular conditions
example_in_english: Researchers now need to do more experiments.
example_in_uzbek: Tadqiqotchilar endi ko'proq tajribalar o'tkazishlari kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Izertlewshiler endi kóbirek tájiriybeler ótkeriwi kerek.

definition: A small tool or piece of equipment that does something that is useful or impressive
example_in_english: That's a very useful gadget!
example_in_uzbek: Bu juda foydali qurilma!
example_in_karakalpak: Bul júdá paydalı qurılma!

definition: Computer equipment
example_in_english: Printers and modems are examples of hardware.
example_in_uzbek: Printerning va modemlar apparat qismlariga misol bo'ladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Printerdin hám modemler apparat bólimlerine misal boladı.

definition: To design or create something that did not exist before
example_in_english: Alfred Nobel invented dynamite.
example_in_uzbek: Alfred Nobel dinamitni ixtiro qildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Alfred Nobel dinamitti oylap taptı.

definition: To include something as part of an activity, event, or situation
example_in_english: The course involves a lot of hard work.
example_in_uzbek: Kurs ko'p mehnat talab qiladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kurs kóp miynet talap etedi.

definition: A building or large room where people do scientific research
example_in_english: This is our new research laboratory.
example_in_uzbek: Bu bizning yangi tadqiqot laboratoriyamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul biziń jańa izertlew laboratoriyamız.

definition: To not have something, or to not have enough of something
example_in_english: He lacked the skills required for the job.
example_in_uzbek: U ish uchun kerakli ko'nikmalarga ega emas edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol jumıs ushın kerekli kónlikpelerge ie emes edi.

uzbek_word: biron nimaga ega bo'lmaslik, yoki yetarlicha bo'lmaslik
definition: A situation in which you do not have something, or do not have enough of something
example_in_english: The match was cancelled because of lack of support.
example_in_uzbek: O'yin qo'llab-quvvatlashning etishmasligi sababli bekor qilindi.
example_in_karakalpak: Oyın qollap-quwatlawdıń jetispewshiligi sebepli biykarlandı.

definition: A small computer that you can carry with you
example_in_english: I'm going to buy a new laptop.
example_in_uzbek: Men yangi noutbuk sotib olmoqchiman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men jańa noutbuk satıp almaqshıman.

definition: The largest in amount, size, or number that is allowed or possible
example_in_english: The maximum amount of cash you can withdraw is €500.
example_in_uzbek: Naqd pulni yechib olishning maksimal miqdori €500.
example_in_karakalpak: Naq pul sheship alıwdıń maksimal muǵdarı €500.

definition: The smallest in amount, size, or number that is allowed or possible
example_in_english: What's the minimum voting age in your country?
example_in_uzbek: Sizning mamlakatingizda minimal ovoz berish yoshi qancha?
example_in_karakalpak: Siziń mámleketińizde dawıs beriwdiń minimal jası qansha?

definition: If equipment operates, or if you operate it, you use or control it and it works in the way it should
example_in_english: Do not operate machinery after taking this medication.
example_in_uzbek: Ushbu dorini ichganingizdan keyin mashinalarni boshqarmang.
example_in_karakalpak: Usı dárini ishkennen keyin mashinalardı basqarmań.

definition: A very common light, strong substance that is produced by a chemical process and used for making many different things
example_in_english: This pen is made of plastic.
example_in_uzbek: Ushbu qalam plastikdan qilingan.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul qálem plastikten islengen.

definition: Made of plastic
example_in_english: Have you got a plastic bag?
example_in_uzbek: Sizda plastik sumka bormi?
example_in_karakalpak: Sizde plastik sumka bar ma?

definition: To make a computer or other piece of equipment do something automatically
example_in_english: Can you program the PC to come on in the morning?
example_in_uzbek: Siz kompyuterni ertalab yoqish uchun dasturlashni amalga oshira olasizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz kompyuterdi azanda iske túsiriw ushin programmalastırıwdi ámelge asıra alasız ba?

definition: A series of instructions that makes a computer do something
example_in_english: It's a complicated computer program.
example_in_uzbek: Bu murakkab kompyuter dasturi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul quramalı kompyuter programması.

definition: The detailed study of something in order to discover new facts
example_in_english: Scientists have carried out lots of research into the effects of these drugs.
example_in_uzbek: Olimlar ushbu dori-darmonlarning ta'sirini ko'p tadqiqot qilishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ilimpazlar bul dárilerdiń tásirin kóp izertledi.

definition: If you run a computer program, or if it runs, you start it or use it
example_in_english: The software will run on any PC.
example_in_uzbek: Dastur har qanday kompyuterda ishlaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Programma hár qanday kompyuterde isleydi.

definition: The flat surface on a computer, television, or piece of electronic equipment where words and pictures are shown
example_in_english: Suddenly the screen went blank.
example_in_uzbek: To'satdan ekran o'chib qoldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Birden ekran óship qaldı.

definition: The programs used by computers for doing particular jobs
example_in_english: You log onto our website, then download and install the software.
example_in_uzbek: Siz bizning veb-saytimizga kirib, dasturini yuklab o'rnatishingiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz biziń veb-saytımızǵa kirip, programmasın júklep ornatıwıńız kerek.

definition: Happening very quickly and without any sign that it is going to happen
example_in_english: She felt a sudden pain in her leg.
example_in_uzbek: U oyoqida to'satdan og'riq his etdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol ayaǵında tosattan awırıw sezdi.

definition: Advanced scientific knowledge that is used for practical purposes
example_in_english: Technology is improving all the time.
example_in_uzbek: Texnologiya har doim yaxshilanib bormoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Texnologiya bárqulla jaqsılanıp barmaqta.

definition: Not the same as anything or anyone else
example_in_english: Every person is unique.
example_in_uzbek: Har bir inson o'ziga xosdir.
example_in_karakalpak: Hár bir insan ózine tán.

definition: A way of pronouncing words that shows what country, region, or social class you come from.
example_in_english: Tom hasn't lost his broad Irish accent.
example_in_uzbek: Tom o'zining kuchli irlandcha aksentini yo'qotmagan.
example_in_karakalpak: Tom óziniń kúshli irlandsha akcentin joǵaltpaǵan.

definition: A public statement that gives people information about something.
example_in_english: The head teacher made an announcement about the school holidays.
example_in_uzbek: Maktab direktori ta'tillar to'g'risida e'lon qildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Mektep direktorı dem alıslar haqqında daǵazaladı.

definition: To send out messages or programs to be received by radios or televisions.
example_in_english: The BBC will be broadcasting the match live from Paris.
example_in_uzbek: BBC o'yinni Parijdan jonli efirda namoyish etadi.
example_in_karakalpak: BBC oyındı Parijden janlı efirde kórsetedi.

definition: A program that is broadcast.
example_in_english: They mentioned the problem on Channel 5's main news broadcast.
example_in_uzbek: Muammo 5-kanalning asosiy yangiliklar ko‘rsatuvida aytib o'tildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Mashqala 5-kanaldıń tiykarǵı jańalıqlar kórsetiwinde aytıp ótildi.

definition: A television station and the programs that it broadcasts.
example_in_english: What's on the other channel?
example_in_uzbek: Boshqa kanalda nima beryapti?
example_in_karakalpak: Basqa kanalda ne berip atır?

definition: Easy to understand.
example_in_english: Clear instructions are provided.
example_in_uzbek: Tushunishga oson ko'rsatmalar ta'minlanadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Túsiniwge ansat kórsetpeler támiyinlenedi.

definition: To make a computer do something by pressing a button on the mouse.
example_in_english: To send the message, click on the 'send' button.
example_in_uzbek: Xabarni yuborish uchun, 'jo'natish' tugmasini bosing.
example_in_karakalpak: Xabardı jiberiw ushın, 'júklew' túymesin basıń.

definition: To communicate with someone by phone, e-mail, letter, etc.
example_in_english: Please contact us if you have any information.
example_in_uzbek: Agar qandaydir ma'lumot bo'lsa, iltimos biz bilan bog'laning.
example_in_karakalpak: Eger qandayda bir maǵlıwmat bolsa, iltimas biz benen baylanısıń.

definition: Communication between people, countries, or organizations.
example_in_english: Do you and Jo still keep in contact?
example_in_uzbek: Siz hozir ham Jo bilan aloqani saqlab qolganmisiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz házir de Jo menen baylanısıńızdı saqlap qaldıńız ba?

definition: A set of information that is stored on a computer and that is given a particular name.
example_in_english: I can't find the file on my computer.
example_in_uzbek: Faylni kompyuterimdan topolmayapman.
example_in_karakalpak: Fayldı kompyuterimnen taba almay atırman.

definition: Suitable for serious situations or occasions.
example_in_english: Ameliorate' is a more formal way of saying 'improve'.
example_in_uzbek: Ijobiy tarafga o'zgartirmoq' - bu 'yaxshilamoq' so'zini aytishning yanayam rasmiyroq usuli.
example_in_karakalpak: Unamlı tárepke ózgertiw"" - bul ""jaqsılaw"" sózin aytıwdıń jáne de rásmiy usılı.

definition: A picture, especially one in a mirror or on a computer, television, or cinema screen.
example_in_english: Images of Germany appeared on the screen.
example_in_uzbek: Ekranda Germaniya tasvirlari paydo bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ekranda Germaniya kórinisleri payda boldı.

definition: Suitable for relaxed friendly situations.
example_in_english: You should wear informal clothes to the party tomorrow.
example_in_uzbek: Ertangi bazmga norasmiy kiyinishingiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Erteńgi geshtekke rásmiy emes kiyiniwińiz kerek.

definition: A computer system that allows people in different parts of the world to exchange information.
example_in_english: Do you have access to the Internet?
example_in_uzbek: Internetga kirish imkoniyatiga egamisiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Internetke kiriw imkaniyatına iyesiz be?

definition: To say or do something that stops someone when they are speaking or concentrating on something.
example_in_english: Please don't interrupt her while she's working.
example_in_uzbek: Iltimos, uni ishlayotganda bezovta qilmang.
example_in_karakalpak: Iltimas, onı islep atırǵanda tınıshsızlandırmań.

definition: If people, things, or events are linked, they are related to each other in some way.
example_in_english: Police think that the two robberies are linked.
example_in_uzbek: Politsiyaning fikricha ikki o'g'irlik bir-biriga bog'liq.
example_in_karakalpak: Policiyanıń pikirinshe eki urlıq bir-birine baylanıslı.

definition: A connection between two or more people, places, facts, or events.
example_in_english: Is there any link between this and what we were talking about yesterday?
example_in_uzbek: Kecha gaplashayotgan narsamiz bilan buni o'rtasida qandaydir bog'liqlik mavjudmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Keshe sóylesip atırǵanımız benen bunıń arasında qanday da bir baylanıs bar ma?

definition: Radio, television, newspapers, the Internet, and magazines, considered as a group.
example_in_english: The story has been widely reported in the media.
example_in_uzbek: Hikoya ommaviy axborot vositalarida keng tarqaldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Gúrriń ǵalaba xabar qurallarında keń tarqaldı.

definition: A small phone that you can carry around with you.
example_in_english: Don't forget to take your mobile phone with you when you go out.
example_in_uzbek: Ko'chaga chiqqaningizda, uyali aloqa telefoningizni o'zingiz bilan olib olishni unutmang.
example_in_karakalpak: Kóshege shıqqanıńızda, uyalı baylanıs telefonıńızdı ózińiz benen alıp ketiwdi umıtpań.

definition: Connected to or available through the Internet.
example_in_english: I bought it from an online bookshop.
example_in_uzbek: Uni internet kitob do'konidan sotib oldim.
example_in_karakalpak: Onı internet kitap dúkanınan satıp aldım.

definition: Connected to the Internet.
example_in_english: Let's go online and check your e-mail.
example_in_uzbek: Keling internetga ulanib, elektron pochtangizni tekshiramiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Keliń internetke jalǵanıp, elektron pochtańızdı tekseremiz.

definition: To stop moving or doing something for a short time before starting again.
example_in_english: She paused at the door and then left.
example_in_uzbek: U eshik oldida biroz to'xtab turdi va so'ngra jo'nab ketdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol esik aldında biraz irkildi de, sońınan jónep ketti.

definition: A short time when someone stops moving or doing something before starting again.
example_in_english: There was a short pause before the orchestra continued to play.
example_in_uzbek: Orkestra chalishni davom ettirishidan avval qisqa pauza bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Orkestr shertiwdi dawam ettiriwden aldın qısqa pauza boldı.

definition: To make someone agree to do something by giving them reasons why they should.
example_in_english: He did finally come with us, although it took a long time to persuade him.
example_in_uzbek: Uni ko'ndirishga uzoq vaqt ketganiga qaramay, u oxir-oqibat biz bilan keldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Onı kóndiriwge kóp waqıt ketkenine qaramastan, ol aqırında biz benen keldi.

definition: To say the sounds of words.
example_in_english: I find some Japanese words very difficult to pronounce.
example_in_uzbek: Ba'zi yaponcha so'zlar men uchun talaffuz qilishga qiyin.
example_in_karakalpak: Ayırım yaponsha sózler men ushın aytıwǵa qıyın.

definition: To produce many copies of a book, magazine, or newspaper for people to buy.
example_in_english: Their company publishes a wide selection of books.
example_in_uzbek: Ularning kompaniyasi keng turdagi/to'plamdagi kitoblar chop etadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Olardıń kompaniyası keń túrdegi kitaplardı basıp shıǵaradı.

definition: To provide information about something, especially to people in authority.
example_in_english: You should report the accident to the police.
example_in_uzbek: Politsiyaga avariya to'g'risida xabar berishingiz lozim.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz policiyaǵa avariya haqqında xabar beriwińiz kerek.

definition: A spoken or written description of a particular subject, situation, or event.
example_in_english: A new report shows crime is on the increase.
example_in_uzbek: Yangi hisobot shuni ko'rsatadiki, jinoyatlar soni ortib bormoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Jańa esabat sonı kórsetedi, jınayatlar sanı artıp barmaqta.

definition: To ask for something, or to ask someone to do something, in a polite or formal way.
example_in_english: I would like to request a meeting with the manager, please.
example_in_uzbek: Men menejer bilan uchrashuv belgilashni so'ramoqchiman, iltimos.
example_in_karakalpak: Men menejer menen ushırasıw belgilewdi soramaqshıman, iltimas.

definition: An act of asking for something in a polite or formal way.
example_in_english: Evening meals are available on request.
example_in_uzbek: Kechki ovqatlar so'rov bo'yicha mavjud.
example_in_karakalpak: Keshki awqatlar soraw boyınsha bar.

definition: To call someone on the telephone.
example_in_english: Ring me at home later.
example_in_uzbek: Keyinroq uyda menga qo'ng'iroq qiling.
example_in_karakalpak: Keyinirek úyde maǵan qońıraw etiń.

definition: A movement or sound that is made by someone and has a special meaning for another person.
example_in_english: We waited for them to give us the signal to move.
example_in_uzbek: Harakatlanishga ishora berishlarini kutdik.
example_in_karakalpak: Qozǵalıwǵa isharat beriwin kúttik.

definition: To use words that are deliberately offensive, for example because you are angry.
example_in_english: That's the first time I've ever heard him swear.
example_in_uzbek: Men uning so'kinishini birinchi marta eshitib turibman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men onıń sóginiwin birinshi mártebe esitip turman.

definition: A group of people or things with similar qualities that make them different from other groups.
example_in_english: She quickly typed back a response.
example_in_uzbek: U tezlik bilan javob yozib yubordi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol tezlik penen juwap jazıp jiberdi.

definition: Someone who watches television programmes.
example_in_english: Our regular viewers will know that it's time for Double Money!
example_in_uzbek: Bizning doimiy tomoshabinlarimiz Ikki Karra Pul ko'rsatuvining vaqti kelganini bilishadi!
example_in_karakalpak: Biziń turaqlı tamashagóylerimiz Eki ese aqsha kórsetiwiniń waqtı kelgenin biledi!

definition: A place on the Internet where information is available about a particular subject, company, university, etc.
example_in_english: I'm thinking of starting a website for people from our school.
example_in_uzbek: Maktabimizdan bo'lgan odamlar uchun vebsayt yuritish haqida o'ylayapman.
example_in_karakalpak: Mektebimizden bolǵan adamlar ushın veb-sayt júrgiziw haqqında oylap atırman.

definition: To speak very quietly to someone, so that other people cannot hear you.
example_in_english: Stop whispering, you two!
example_in_uzbek: Hoy siz ikkovingiz, pichirlashni bas qiling!
example_in_karakalpak: Haw sizler ekewińiz, sıbırlanıwdı toqtatıń!

definition: A very quiet way of saying something to someone so that other people cannot hear you.
example_in_english: Be careful!' she said in a whisper.
example_in_uzbek: U past ovozda 'Ehtiyot bo'ling!' deb aytdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol áste dawıs penen ""Abaylı bolıń!"" dep ayttı.

definition: To say that you have done something wrong.
example_in_english: In court, he admitted that he had lied about the accident.
example_in_uzbek: Sudda u avariya haqida yolg'on gapirganini tan oldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Sudta ol avariya haqqında ótirik aytqanın moyınladı.

definition: If the police arrest someone, they take that person to a police station because they think that he or she has committed a crime.
example_in_english: The police entered the building and arrested six men.
example_in_uzbek: Politsiya binoga kirib, olti odamni hibsga oldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Policiya imaratqa kirip, altı adamdı qamaqqa aldı.

definition: An organization that gives money and help to people who need it; money or food that is given to people who need it.
example_in_english: The event raised €59,000 for charity.
example_in_uzbek: Tadbir xayriya uchun €59,000 yig'di.
example_in_karakalpak: Ilaj qayırqomlıq ushın €59.000 jıynadı.

definition: To do something that is illegal.
example_in_english: What makes people commit crimes?
example_in_uzbek: Odamlarni jinoyat qilishga nima majbur qiladi?
example_in_karakalpak: Adamlardı jınayat islewge ne májbúrleydi?

definition: The people who live in an area.
example_in_english: I wanted to work somewhere where I could serve the community.
example_in_uzbek: Men jamoatga xizmat qila oladigan joyda ishlamoqchi edim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men jámáátke xızmet ete alatuǵın jerde islewdi qáler edim.

definition: A place where trials take place and legal cases are decided.
example_in_english: The man will appear in court on Monday.
example_in_uzbek: Erkak dushanba kuni sudga chiqadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Er adam dúyshembi kúni sudqa shıǵadı.

definition: Someone who has committed a crime.
example_in_english: Some criminals take exams in prison.
example_in_uzbek: Ba'zi jinoyatchilar qamoqxonada imtihon topshirishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ayırım jınayatshılar qamaqxanada imtixan tapsıradı.

definition: Relating to illegal acts.
example_in_english: That's criminal behavior!
example_in_uzbek: Bu jinoyat xulq-atvori!
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jınayıy minez-qulıq!

definition: A society that has its own set of ideas, beliefs, and ways of behaving.
example_in_english: There were people from lots of different cultures at the meeting.
example_in_uzbek: Yig'ilishda ko'plab turli madaniyatlardan odamlar bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Jıynalısta kóplegen túrli mádeniyatlardan adamlar boldı.

definition: Well known to you, or easily recognized by you.
example_in_english: The name Harry Potter will be familiar to many readers.
example_in_uzbek: Garri Potter ismi ko'p o'quvchilarga tanish bo'ladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Garri Potter atı kóp oqıwshılarǵa tanıs boladı.

definition: The people who control a country or area and make decisions about its laws and taxes.
example_in_english: The government has announced plans to raise the minimum wage next year.
example_in_uzbek: Hukumat kelasi yil uchun minimal ish haqini oshirish rejasini e'lon qildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Húkimet kelesi jıl ushın minimal is haqını asırıw rejesin járiyaladı.

definition: Something that you do often.
example_in_english: Biting your fingernails is a very bad habit!
example_in_uzbek: Tirnoqlarni tishlash juda yomon odat!
example_in_karakalpak: Tırnaqlardı tislew júdá jaman ádet!

definition: An official document that shows who you are.
example_in_english: The police officer asked to see my identity card.
example_in_uzbek: Politsiya xodimi mening shaxsiy guvohnomamni ko'rishni so'radi.
example_in_karakalpak: Policiya xızmetkeri meniń jeke gúwalıǵımdı kóriwdi soradı.

definition: Not allowed by the law.
example_in_english: Robbing banks is illegal.
example_in_uzbek: Banklarni o'g'irlash noqonuniy hisoblanadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Banklerdi urlaw nızamsız esaplanadı.

definition: The ideas and activities involved in getting power in an area or governing it.
example_in_english: She's heavily involved in local politics.
example_in_uzbek: U mahalliy siyosatda faol ishtirok etmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol jergilikli siyasatta belsene qatnaspaqta.

definition: The number of people who live in a particular area.
example_in_english: Los Angeles has a population of over 3 million.
example_in_uzbek: Los-Anjelesning aholisi 3 milliondan ortiq.
example_in_karakalpak: Los-Anjelestiń xalqı 3 millionnan artıq.

definition: An institution where people are kept as a punishment for committing a crime.
example_in_english: He's currently in prison.
example_in_uzbek: U hozirda qamoqdamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol házir qamaqta.

definition: To show publicly that you oppose something.
example_in_english: Workers are protesting against high unemployment.
example_in_uzbek: Ishchilar yuqori ishsizlikka qarshi norozilik bildirmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Jumısshılar joqarı jumıssızlıqqa qarsı narazılıq bildirmekte.

definition: An occasion when people show strong public opposition to something.
example_in_english: Students will hold a protest this weekend outside Parliament.
example_in_uzbek: Talabalar bu hafta oxirida Parlament oldida norozilik namoyishi o'tkazadilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Studentler usı hápte aqırında Parlament aldında narazılıq demonstraciyasın ótkeredi.

definition: Someone who lives in a particular place.
example_in_english: Many local residents have objected to the new road.
example_in_uzbek: Ko'plab mahalliy aholi yangi yo'lga qarshi chiqdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kóplegen jergilikli xalıq jańa jolǵa qarsı shıqtı.

definition: If you are responsible for something that has happened, you caused it, or you deserve to be blamed for it; in charge of someone or something.
example_in_english: He was responsible for the accident.
example_in_uzbek: U avariya uchun javobgar edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol avariya ushın juwapker edi.

definition: To take money or property from someone illegally.
example_in_english: They were planning to rob the museum.
example_in_uzbek: Ular muzeyni o'g'irlashni rejalashtirishgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Olar muzeydi urlawdı rejelestirgen.

definition: Your usual way of doing things.
example_in_english: It shouldn't take too long to return to our old routine.
example_in_uzbek: Eski tartibimizga qaytish uzoq vaqt olmaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Eski tártibimizge qaytıw uzaq waqıt almaydı.

definition: Ordinary and not interesting or special.
example_in_english: This is just routine work.
example_in_uzbek: Bu oddiy ish.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul ápiwayı jumıs.

definition: A plan of activities or events and when they will happen.
example_in_english: What's your schedule for today?
example_in_uzbek: Bugungi jadvalingiz qanday?
example_in_karakalpak: Búgingi kesteniz qanday?

definition: The set of conditions that exist at a particular time in a particular place.
example_in_english: I found myself in an embarrassing situation.
example_in_uzbek: Men o'zimni noqulay vaziyatda topdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men ózimdi qolaysız jaǵdayda taptım.

definition: Relating to society and to people's lives in general.
example_in_english: There are lots of social problems, such as unemployment.
example_in_uzbek: Ijtimoiy muammolar, masalan, ishsizlik, ko'p.
example_in_karakalpak: Sociallıq mashqalalar, máselen, jumıssızlıq, kóp.

definition: People in general living together in organized communities, with laws and traditions controlling how they behave towards each other.
example_in_english: Society has to support its old people.
example_in_uzbek: Jamiyat o'zining keksa insonlarini qo'llab-quvvatlashi kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Jámiyet óziniń kekse adamların qollap-quwatlawı kerek.

definition: To take something that belongs to someone else without permission.
example_in_english: She was caught stealing food from the supermarket.
example_in_uzbek: U supermarketdan ovqat o'g'irlashda qo'lga olindi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol supermarketten awqat urlawda uslandı.

definition: A very old custom, belief, or story.
example_in_english: His son followed the family tradition and entered politics.
example_in_uzbek: Uning o'g'li oilaviy an'analarni davom ettirib, siyosatga kirgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń balası shańaraqlıq dástúrlerdi dawam ettirip, siyasatqa kirgen.

definition: Like most things of the same type.
example_in_english: His opinions are typical of people of his generation.
example_in_uzbek: Uning fikrlari o'z avlodidagi odamlar uchun xosdir.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń pikirleri óz áwladındaǵı adamlar ushın tán.

definition: To decide something, or to choose a representative or winner, by officially stating your choice, for example in an election.
example_in_english: I'm going to vote for Jackson.
example_in_uzbek: Men Jekson uchun ovoz beraman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Jekson ushın dauıs beremen.

definition: An official choice you make between two or more issues, people, etc., for example in an election.
example_in_english: My vote will go to the candidate who promises lower taxes.
example_in_uzbek: Mening ovozim soliqni kamaytirishni va'da qilgan nomzodga boradi.
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń dawısım salıqtı azaytıwdı wáde etken talabanǵa baradı.

definition: A place where young people can go to meet and take part in activities.
example_in_english: Let's go to the youth club after school.
example_in_uzbek: Maktabdan so'ng yoshlar klubiga boramiz
example_in_karakalpak: Mektepten keyin jaslar klubına baramız

definition: Something that you very much want to achieve.
example_in_english: His ambition was to become a successful writer.
example_in_uzbek: Uning maqsadi muvaffaqiyatli yozuvchi bo'lish edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń maqseti tabıslı jazıwshı bolıw edi.

definition: A formal request to do something or have something, for example, a job.
example_in_english: His application for membership was rejected.
example_in_uzbek: Uning a'zolik uchun arizasi rad etildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń aǵzalıq ushın arzası biykar etildi.

definition: An arrangement with a bank that allows you to keep your money there.
example_in_english: We'll pay the money into your bank account.
example_in_uzbek: Pulni sizning bank hisobingizga o'tkazamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Puldı siziń bank esabıńızǵa ótkeremiz.

definition: The person who is in charge of you at work.
example_in_english: I asked my boss for a day off next week.
example_in_uzbek: Men o'z boshimdan keyingi hafta bir kun ta'til so'radim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men óz basımnan keyingi háptede bir kún dem alıs soradım.

definition: A job or profession that you work at for some time.
example_in_english: Rosen had decided on an academic career.
example_in_uzbek: Rosen akademik karera tanlagan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Rozen akademik karera tanlagan edi.

definition: Someone who works in the same organization or department as you.
example_in_english: Friends and colleagues will remember him as a kind man.
example_in_uzbek: Do'stlar va hamkasblar uni mehribon inson sifatida eslaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Dosları hám kásiplesleri onı mehriban insan sıpatında esleydi.
