definition: An organization that sells services or goods.
example_in_english: Max works for a large oil company.
example_in_uzbek: Max katta neft kompaniyasida ishlaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Max úlken neft kompaniyasında isleydi.

definition: A written legal agreement between two people or organizations.
example_in_english: After six months, she was offered a contract of employment.
example_in_uzbek: Olti oydan so'ng, unga ish shartnomasi taklif qilindi.
example_in_karakalpak: Altı aydan soń, oǵan jumıs shártnaması usınıs etildi.

definition: A section in a government, organization, or business that deals with a particular type of work.
example_in_english: You need to speak to our sales department.
example_in_uzbek: Siz bizning savdo bo'limimiz bilan gaplashishingiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz biziń sawda bólimimiz benen sóylesiwińiz kerek.

definition: If you deserve something, it is right that you get it because of the way that you are or the way that you have behaved.
example_in_english: After five hours on your feet, you deserve a break.
example_in_uzbek: Besh soat oyoq ustida turganingizdan so'ng, dam olishga haqliysiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Bes saat ayaqta turǵannan soń, dem alıwǵa haqılısız.

definition: To receive money for work that you do.
example_in_english: Most people here earn about €30,000 a year.
example_in_uzbek: Bu yerda ko'pchilik odamlar yilda taxminan €30,000 ishlaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jerde kópshilik adamlar jılına shama menen 30 000 € isleydi.

definition: The state of being famous.
example_in_english: Albert Finney rose to fame in the British cinema of the early Sixties.
example_in_uzbek: Albert Finney 1960-yillarning boshlaridagi britaniya kinolarida mashhur bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Albert Finney 1960-jıllardıń baslarındaǵı Britaniya kinolarında belgili boldı.

definition: The action of putting a ball into a goal in a game such as football.
example_in_english: Nielsen scored two goals in the last ten minutes.
example_in_uzbek: Nielsen oxirgi o'n daqiqada ikki gol urdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Nielsen sońǵı on minutta eki gol urdı.

definition: If someone or something impresses you, you admire them.
example_in_english: Her ability to deal with problems impresses me.
example_in_uzbek: Muammolarni hal qilish qobiliyati meni ta'sir qiladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Mashqalalardı sheshiw qábileti maǵan tásir etedi.

definition: Money that someone gets from working or from investing money.
example_in_english: What is your approximate annual income?
example_in_uzbek: Sizning taxminiy yillik daromadingiz qancha?
example_in_karakalpak: Siziń shama menen jıllıq dáramatıńız qansha?

definition: All the businesses involved in producing a particular type of goods or services.
example_in_english: How long have you worked in the oil industry?
example_in_uzbek: Siz neft sanoatida qancha vaqt ishladingiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz neft sanaatında qansha waqit islediniz?

definition: To ask someone, especially someone famous, questions about themselves, their work, or their ideas.
example_in_english: He was interviewed on the radio this morning.
example_in_uzbek: U bugun ertalab radio orqali intervyu berdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol búgin azanda radio arqalı intervyu berdi.

definition: A meeting in which someone asks another person, especially a famous person, questions about themselves, their work, or their ideas.
example_in_english: This is her first interview since becoming Olympic champion.
example_in_uzbek: Bu uning Olimpiya chempioni bo'lganidan keyingi birinchi intervyusi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul onıń Olimpiada chempionı bolǵannan keyingi birinshi intervyu bolıp tabıladı.

definition: Someone who is in charge of a group, organization, or country.
example_in_english: Victoria became a manager because she's a good leader.
example_in_uzbek: Viktoriya yaxshi rahbar bo'lgani uchun menejer bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Viktoriya jaqsı basshı bolǵanı ushın menedjer boldı.

definition: Someone whose job is to organize and control the work of a business, a department, or the people who work there.
example_in_english: I'd like to speak to the manager.
example_in_uzbek: Men menejer bilan gaplashmoqchiman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men menedjer menen sóylespekshimen.

definition: An amount of money that someone receives regularly when they no longer work because of their age or because they are ill.
example_in_english: My grandma stopped working three years ago and now she gets a pension.
example_in_uzbek: Mening buvim uch yil oldin ishlashni to'xtatdi va endi pensiya oladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń ájapam úsh jıl burın jumıs islewdi toqtattı hám endi pensiya aladı.

definition: A situation in which someone does not have enough money to pay for their basic needs.
example_in_english: Half the world's population is living in poverty.
example_in_uzbek: Dunyoning yarmi qashshoqlikda yashamoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Dúnyanıń yarımı kámbaǵallıqta jasamaqta.

definition: Attempts to persuade or force someone to do something.
example_in_english: My parents put me under a lot of pressure at school.
example_in_uzbek: Mening ota-onam meni maktabda katta bosim ostida qo'yishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń ata-anam meni mektepte úlken basım astına qoydı.

definition: A previous event, period, or thing happened or existed before the one that you are talking about.
example_in_english: All the other guests had arrived the previous day.
example_in_uzbek: Boshqa barcha mehmonlar oldingi kunda kelishgan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Basqa barlıq qonaqlar aldınǵı kúni kelgen edi.

definition: A job that you need special skills and qualifications to do.
example_in_english: Her father discouraged her from going into the legal profession.
example_in_uzbek: Uning otasi uni huquq sohasiga kirishdan qaytardi.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń ákesi onı huqıq tarawına kiriwden qaytarǵan.

definition: To stop working permanently, especially when you are old.
example_in_english: He retired from the army last month.
example_in_uzbek: U o‘tgan oy armiyadan nafaqaga chiqdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol ótken ayda armiyadan dem alısqa shıqtı.

definition: A fixed amount of money that you earn each month or year from your job.
example_in_english: Lisa gets an annual salary of €30,000.
example_in_uzbek: Liza yillik €30,000 maosh oladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Liza jıllıq 30 000 € is haqı aladı.

definition: The people who work for a particular company, organization, or institution.
example_in_english: She joined the staff in 1996.
example_in_uzbek: U 1996-yilda xodimlar safiga qo'shildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol 1996-jılı xızmetkerler qatarına qosıldı.

definition: A period of time during which people refuse to work, as a protest.
example_in_english: There's a tram strike in the city.
example_in_uzbek: Shaharda tramvay ish tashladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Qalada tramvay is tasladı.

definition: To make someone pay money to the government.
example_in_english: Everyone in my country pays 20 per cent tax on any money they earn.
example_in_uzbek: Mening mamlakatimda har kim o'z daromadidan 20 foiz soliq to'laydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń mámleketimde hár kim óz dáramatınan 20 procent salıq tóleydi.

definition: An amount of money that you have to pay to the government.
example_in_english: The government has promised to lower taxes after the election.
example_in_uzbek: Hukumat saylovlardan keyin soliqni kamaytirishni va'da qildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Húkimet saylawlardan keyin salıqtı azaytıwdı wáde etti.

definition: Rich.
example_in_english: Ian became a very wealthy businessman.
example_in_uzbek: Ian juda boy ishbilarmon bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ian júdá bay isbilermen boldı.

definition: To change or influence something, often in a negative way.
example_in_english: Did the newspapers really affect the outcome of the election?
example_in_uzbek: Gazetalar saylov natijalariga haqiqatan ta'sir qildimi?
example_in_karakalpak: Gazetalar saylaw nátiyjelerine haqıyqattan da tásir kórsetti me?

definition: To create or preserve a good or correct balance between different features or aspects.
example_in_english: We have to balance the needs and tastes of all our customers.
example_in_uzbek: Biz barcha mijozlarimizning ehtiyojlari va didlarini muvozanatlashimiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz barlıq klientlerimizdiń mútájlikleri hám talǵamların teńlestiriwimiz kerek.

definition: A situation in which different aspects or features are treated equally or exist in the correct relationship to each other.
example_in_english: A healthy diet is about getting the correct balance of a variety of foods.
example_in_uzbek: Sog'lom dieta turli xil oziq-ovqatlarning to'g'ri muvozanatini olish haqida.
example_in_karakalpak: Salamat dieta túrli azıq-awqatlardıń durıs balansın alıw haqqında.

definition: To get an advantage, or to give someone an advantage.
example_in_english: Thousands of people could benefit from the invention.
example_in_uzbek: Minglab odamlar ixtiro foydasini ko'rishi mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Mıńlaǵan adamlar oylap tabılıwdıń paydasın kóriwi múmkin.

definition: An advantage that you get from a situation.
example_in_english: He has had the benefit of the best education money can buy.
example_in_uzbek: U pul bilan sotib olinadigan eng yaxshi ta'limdan foydalanib kelmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol pulǵa satıp alınatuǵın eń jaqsı bilimlendiriwden paydalanıp kelmekte.

definition: To take air into your lungs through your nose or mouth and let it out again.
example_in_english: Doctors said he was having difficulty breathing.
example_in_uzbek: Doktorlar uning nafas olishda qiyinchilik yuzaga kelganini aytishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Doktorlar onıń dem alıwda qıyınshılıq payda bolǵanın ayttı.

definition: To use your teeth to bite food in your mouth into small pieces.
example_in_english: She chewed her food slowly.
example_in_uzbek: U ovqatini sekin-sekin chaynadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol awqatın áste-aqırın shaynadı.

definition: To cut something such as food or wood into pieces.
example_in_english: Chop the meat into small pieces.
example_in_uzbek: Go'shtni kichik bo'laklarga kesing.
example_in_karakalpak: Góshti mayda bóleklerge bóliń.

definition: To have something inside.
example_in_english: The envelope contained a few old photographs.
example_in_uzbek: Konvertda bir necha eski fotosuratlar bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Konvertte bir neshe eski fotosúwretler bar edi.

definition: To force air up through your throat with a sudden noise, especially when you have a cold or when you want to get someone's attention.
example_in_english: My chest felt painful, and I was coughing uncontrollably.
example_in_uzbek: Ko'kragim og'rirdi va men nazorat qilinmaydigan yo'talib turardim.
example_in_karakalpak: Kókiregim awırdı hám men qadaǵalawǵa bolmaytuǵın jótelip turdım.

definition: The action of coughing, or the sound that you make when you cough.
example_in_english: I've got a bad cough.
example_in_uzbek: Men yomon yo'taldim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men qattı jóteldim.

definition: To stop someone from being affected by an illness.
example_in_english: Only an operation will cure her.
example_in_uzbek: Faqat operatsiya uni davolaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Tek operaciya ǵana onı emleydi.

definition: A medicine or treatment that makes someone who is ill become healthy.
example_in_english: Doctors say there are several possible cures.
example_in_uzbek: Doktorlar bir necha mumkin bo'lgan davolar borligini aytishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Doktorlar bir neshe múmkin bolǵan emler barlıǵın aytadı.

definition: To do a physical activity in order to stay healthy and to make your body stronger.
example_in_english: Do you eat properly and exercise regularly?
example_in_uzbek: Siz to'g'ri ovqatlanasizmi va muntazam jismoniy mashqlar qilasizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz duris awqatlanasız ba hám turaqlı fizikalıq shınıǵıwlar isleysiz be?

definition: Physical activity that you do in order to stay healthy and make your body stronger.
example_in_english: I get plenty of exercise being an aerobics instructor.
example_in_uzbek: Aerobika instruktor sifatida ko'p jismoniy mashqlar qilaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Aerobika instruktorı sıpatında kóp fizikalıq shınıǵıwlar isleymen.

definition: A very common infectious disease that lasts for a short time and makes you feel weak and tired.
example_in_english: My dad has got flu.
example_in_uzbek: Mening dadam grippdan aziyat chekmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń ákem gripp penen auırıp atır.

definition: The process of cutting into someone's body for medical reasons.
example_in_english: The baby had to have an operation.
example_in_uzbek: Bolaga operatsiya qilish kerak edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Balaǵa operaciya islew kerek edi.

definition: Physically strong and not ill.
example_in_english: I feel very healthy at the moment.
example_in_uzbek: Hozirda juda sog'lom his qilaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Házir júdá saw-salamat sezinemen.

definition: To not consider something, or to not let it influence you.
example_in_english: We had ignored the fact that it was getting darker.
example_in_uzbek: Biz qorayib borayotgan faktni e'tiborsiz qoldirdik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz qarawıtıp baratırǵan faktti itibarǵa almay qaldıq.

definition: A disease that is caused by bacteria or by a virus.
example_in_english: I've got a throat infection.
example_in_uzbek: Men tomoq infektsiyasidan aziyat chekmoqdaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men tamaq infekciyasınan azap shegip atırman.

definition: One of the foods or liquids that you use in making a particular meal.
example_in_english: Mix all the ingredients together carefully.
example_in_uzbek: Barcha ingredientlarni ehtiyotkorlik bilan aralashtiring.
example_in_karakalpak: Barlıq ingredientlerdi abaylap aralastırıń.

definition: Physical harm.
example_in_english: All the passengers in the vehicle escaped injury.
example_in_uzbek: Transportdagi barcha yo'lovchilar jarohatlanmasdan qutuldilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Transporttaǵı barlıq jolawshılar jaraqatlanbastan qutıldı.

definition: To prevent a number, amount, or effect from increasing past a particular point.
example_in_english: We want to limit classes to a maximum of 30 pupils.
example_in_uzbek: Darslarni maksimal 30 nafar o'quvchi bilan cheklamoqchimiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Sabaqlardı maksimal 30 oqıwshı menen sheklewdi qáleymiz.

definition: The greatest amount of something that is possible or allowed.
example_in_english: The speed limit here is 40 miles an hour.
example_in_uzbek: Bu yerda tezlik cheklovi soatiga 40 milya.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jerde tezlik shegarası saatına 40 mil.

definition: An occasion when you eat, such as breakfast or lunch, or the food that you eat at that time.
example_in_english: He cooked us a delicious meal.
example_in_uzbek: U bizga mazali taom tayyorladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol bizge mazalı awqat tayarladı.

definition: A small piece of solid medicine that you swallow with water.
example_in_english: Did you remember to take your pills this morning?
example_in_uzbek: Bugun ertalab dorilaringizni olishni eslab qoldingizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Búgin azanda dári-dármaqlarıńızdı alıwdı umıttıńız ba?

definition: To become fit and healthy again after an illness or injury.
example_in_english: I haven't fully recovered from the flu.
example_in_uzbek: Men grippdan to'liq tuzalmadim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men grippten tolıq táwir bolmadım.

definition: Containing salt, or tasting like salt.
example_in_english: This soup is very salty.
example_in_uzbek: Bu sho'rva juda sho'r.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul sorpa júdá duzlı.

definition: To cut something into flat pieces.
example_in_english: I'll slice some bread.
example_in_uzbek: Men ozroq nonni kesaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men azıraq nandı kesemen.

definition: A flat piece of food that has been cut from something larger.
example_in_english: Cut the bread into thick slices.
example_in_uzbek: Nonni qalin bo'laklarga kesing.
example_in_karakalpak: Nandı qalıń bóleklerge kesin.

definition: With a taste like a lemon.
example_in_english: If it's too sour, add some sugar.
example_in_uzbek: Agar juda kislotali bo'lsa, ozroq shakar qo'shing.
example_in_karakalpak: Eger júdá kislotalı bolsa, azıraq qumsheker qosıń.

definition: With a strong hot flavor.
example_in_english: Curry should be spicy!
example_in_uzbek: Karriga achchiq bo'lishi kerak!
example_in_karakalpak: Karriga ashıwlanıw kerek!

definition: To move food or a liquid around using a spoon or other object.
example_in_english: Stir the sauce gently over a low heat.
example_in_uzbek: Sousni past olovda ehtiyotkorlik bilan aralashtiring.
example_in_karakalpak: Sosusti pás otta abaylap aralastırıń.

definition: To feel pain in your body or mind, or to have a particular illness or physical problem.
example_in_english: I'm suffering from a cold at the moment.
example_in_uzbek: Hozirda sovuqdan azob chekmoqdaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Házirgi waqıtta suwıqtan azap shegip atırman.

definition: To have a particular flavor, to eat or drink something and experience its flavor.
example_in_english: The dinner was one of the best meals I've ever tasted.
example_in_uzbek: Kechki ovqat men tatib ko'rgan eng yaxshi taomlardan biri edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Keshki awqat men tatıp kórgen eń jaqsı awqatlardan biri edi.

definition: The flavor that something creates in your mouth when you eat or drink it.
example_in_english: I love the taste of chocolate.
example_in_uzbek: Men shokolad ta'mini juda yaxshi ko'raman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men shokolad dámin júdá jaqsı kóremen.

definition: The process of providing medical care, or a particular type of medical care.
example_in_english: What's the best treatment for this disease?
example_in_uzbek: Bu kasallik uchun eng yaxshi davolanish nima?
example_in_karakalpak: Bul kesellik ushın eń jaqsı emlew usılı qanday?

definition: A natural substance in food that is necessary to keep your body healthy.
example_in_english: Oranges contain lots of vitamin C.
example_in_uzbek: Apelsinlar ko'p miqdorda C vitamini o'z ichiga oladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Apelsinlerde kóp muǵdarda C vitamini bar.

definition: Very old.
example_in_english: They've found an ancient city at the bottom of the sea.
example_in_uzbek: Ular dengiz tubidan qadimiy shaharni topishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Olar teńiz túbinen áyyemgi qalanı taptı.

definition: Printed or woven in a pattern of squares.
example_in_english: I got a new red and blue checked shirt.
example_in_uzbek: Men yangi qizil va ko'k tekisli ko'ylak oldim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men jańa qızıl hám kók tegis kóylek aldım.

definition: Cloth made from the white fibers of a plant called a cotton plant.
example_in_english: Is this shirt made out of cotton?
example_in_uzbek: Bu ko'ylak paxtadan tayyorlanganmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Bul kóylek paxtadan islengen be?

definition: To make something new exist or happen.
example_in_english: How do I create a new file?
example_in_uzbek: Yangi faylni qanday yarataman?
example_in_karakalpak: Jana fayldı qalay payda etemen?

definition: To decide how something will be made, how it will work, or what it will look like, and often to make drawings of it.
example_in_english: The bride wore a dress that she'd designed herself.
example_in_uzbek: Kelin o'zi dizayn qilgan libosni kiygan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kelin ózi dizayn qılǵan lipas kiygen edi.

definition: The way that something is made so that it works and looks a certain way, or a drawing that shows what it will look like.
example_in_english: The car has a new design.
example_in_uzbek: Mashinada yangi dizayn mavjud.
example_in_karakalpak: Mashinanıń jańa dizaynı bar.

definition: To repair something.
example_in_english: Jessica fixed my watch.
example_in_uzbek: Jessika mening soatimi tuzatilgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Jessika meniń saatım ońlanǵan.

definition: To bend a piece of paper or cloth and press one part of it over another part.
example_in_english: Fold the paper in half.
example_in_uzbek: Qog'ozni yarmiga egib qo'ying.
example_in_karakalpak: Qaǵazdı yarımǵa búgip qoyıń.

definition: A public building where you can look at paintings and other works of art.
example_in_english: We could go to a museum or a gallery this weekend.
example_in_uzbek: Biz bu hafta oxirida muzey yoki galereyaga borishimiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz bul hápte aqırında muzey yamasa galereyaǵa barıwımız múmkin.

definition: The state of being better than before, or the process of making something better than it was before.
example_in_english: There has been an improvement in relations between the two countries.
example_in_uzbek: Ikki mamlakat o'rtasidagi munosabatlarda yaxshilanish bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Eki mámleket arasındaǵı qatnasıqlarda jaqsılanıw boldı.

definition: Loose clothes are large and do not fit your body tightly.
example_in_english: These jeans are a bit loose, so maybe I need a smaller size.
example_in_uzbek: Bu jinsi shimlar biroz keng, ehtimol kichikroq o'lcham kerak bo'lishi mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jinsi shalbarlar biraz keń, itimal kishirek ólshem kerek bolıwı múmkin.

definition: To make regular repairs to something, so that it stays in good condition.
example_in_english: The car had been very well maintained.
example_in_uzbek: Mashina juda yaxshi saqlanib kelinayotgan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Mashina júdá jaqsı saqlanıp kiyatırǵan edi.

definition: If one thing matches another, or they match, they form an attractive combination.
example_in_english: She wore a green dress and a hat to match.
example_in_uzbek: U yashil libos va mos keladigan shapka kiygan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol jasıl kóylek hám sáykes keletuǵın shapka kiygen edi.

definition: Cloth or substance used to make things.
example_in_english: What sort of material is your desk made from?
example_in_uzbek: Sizning stolingiz qaysi materialdan tayyorlangan?
example_in_karakalpak: Siziń stolınız qanday materialdan tayarlangan?

definition: To become conscious of someone or something by seeing, hearing, or feeling them.
example_in_english: After a few days here, you hardly notice the noise.
example_in_uzbek: Bu yerda bir necha kundan so'ng, siz shovqinni deyarli sezmasligingiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jerde bir neshe kúnnen soń, siz shawqımdı derlik sezbewińiz múmkin.

definition: A written sign or announcement that gives information or warns people about something.
example_in_english: They put up a notice on the door saying they'd gone out of business.
example_in_uzbek: Ular eshikda biznesni yopishganini bildiruvchi e'lonni osib qo'yishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Olar esikte biznesti jabıstırǵanın bildiretuǵın daǵaza ildirip qoydı.

definition: A set of lines, shapes, or colors that are repeated regularly.
example_in_english: I like the pattern on your carpet.
example_in_uzbek: Men sizning gilamingizdagi naqshni yoqtiraman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men sizin gileminizdegi naģisti unataman.

definition: A number of things that are put on top of each other in an untidy way.
example_in_english: Rubbish lay in piles in the street.
example_in_uzbek: Ko'chada axlat to'plangan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kóshede shıǵındı jıynalǵan edi.

definition: Involving, or relating to, real situations rather than theories or ideas alone.
example_in_english: Practical experience can be as valuable as academic qualifications.
example_in_uzbek: Amaliy tajriba akademik malakalarga teng qadrga ega bo'lishi mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Ámeliy tájiriybe akademiyalıq qánigeliklerge teń qádirge ie bolıwı múmkin.

definition: With a surface that is not smooth.
example_in_english: The walls were built of dark, rough stone.
example_in_uzbek: Devorlar qorong'i, qattiq toshdan qurilgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Diywallar qarańǵı, qattı tastan salınǵan.

definition: The form of something.
example_in_english: Trace the shape onto the card and cut it out.
example_in_uzbek: Shaklni kartonga izlang va kesib oling.
example_in_karakalpak: Figurani kartonga izleń hám kesip alıń.

definition: A thin, smooth cloth made from the fibers produced by insects called silkworms.
example_in_english: I love your new silk shirt.
example_in_uzbek: Men sizning yangi ipak ko'ylagingizni yaxshi ko'raman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men sizin jana jipek kóyleginizdi jaqsı kóremen.

definition: The part of a piece of clothing that covers your arm.
example_in_english: Oh no! I've got a little tear in one of my sleeves.
example_in_uzbek: Oh yo'q! Menimcha bir yelkamda kichik yoriq bor.
example_in_karakalpak: Ax joq! Menińshe bir iynimde kishkene jarıq bar.

definition: Completely even with no rough areas.
example_in_english: How do you keep your skin so smooth?
example_in_uzbek: Sizning teringizni qanday qilib silliq saqlaysiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Siziń terinizdi qalayınsha tegis saqlaysız?

definition: To pull something to make it longer or wider, or to become longer or wider.
example_in_english: Can you stretch the material a little?
example_in_uzbek: Materialni biroz cho'zib bera olasizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Materialdı biraz sozıp bere alasız ba?

definition: With a pattern of colored lines.
example_in_english: There was a blue and white striped tablecloth.
example_in_uzbek: Ko'k va oq chiziqli dasturxon bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kók hám aq sızıqlı dasturxan bar edi.

definition: The way that something is made or done, typical of a particular group, time, or place.
example_in_english: I don't like the style of dresses that are out now.
example_in_uzbek: Hozirgi liboslarning uslubini yoqtirmayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Házirgi kiyimlerdiń fasonın unatpayman.

definition: If a style or something you wear suits you, it makes you look good.
example_in_english: The new hairstyle really suits her.
example_in_uzbek: Yangi soch turmagi unga juda mos keladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Jańa shash turmagi ogan júdá jarasadı.

definition: A set of clothes made from the same cloth, usually a jacket with trousers or a skirt.
example_in_english: He was wearing a dark suit and a tie.
example_in_uzbek: U qorong'i kostyum va galstuk kiygan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol qara kostyum hám galstuk kiygen edi.

definition: Right for a particular purpose, person, or situation.
example_in_english: This film is not suitable for young children.
example_in_uzbek: Bu film yosh bolalar uchun mos emas.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul film jas balalar ushın jaramsız.

definition: To pull something so that it separates into pieces or gets a hole, or to become damaged in this way.
example_in_english: He'd torn his raincoat.
example_in_uzbek: U o'z yomg'ir kurtkasini yirtib yuborgan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol óziniń jamǵır kurtkasın jırtıp alǵan edi.

definition: A hole in something where it has been torn.
example_in_english: There was a tear in her coat.
example_in_uzbek: Uning paltoida yoriq bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń paltosında jarıq bar edi.

definition: Fitting closely around your body or part of your body.
example_in_english: These shoes are too tight.
example_in_uzbek: Bu poyabzallar juda tor.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul ayaq kiyimler júdá tar.

definition: A piece of equipment that you hold to do a particular type of work.
example_in_english: Do you know where my gardening tools are?
example_in_uzbek: Mening bog'dorchilik asboblarim qayerda ekanligini bilasizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń baǵshılıq ásbaplarımdıń qay jerde ekenligin bilesiz be?

definition: Very good, surprising, or impressive.
example_in_english: Her story was quite amazing.
example_in_uzbek: Uning hikoyasi juda ajoyib edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń gúrrińi júdá ájayıp edi.

definition: The type of weather a country or region typically has.
example_in_english: Mexico is well known for its hot climate.
example_in_uzbek: Meksika issiq iqlimi bilan yaxshi tanilgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Meksika ıssı klimatı menen jaqsı belgili.

definition: Areas away from towns and cities, with farms, fields, and trees.
example_in_english: Let's get out of the city and go to the countryside.
example_in_uzbek: Shahardan chiqib, qishloqqa boraylik.
example_in_karakalpak: Qaladan shıǵıp, awılǵa barayıq.

definition: The natural world, including the land, water, air, plants, and animals.
example_in_english: Industries are causing a lot of damage to the environment.
example_in_uzbek: Sanoat muhitga katta zarar yetkazmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Sanaat ortalıqqa úlken zıyan jetkermekte.

definition: When a type of animal or plant no longer exists.
example_in_english: Dinosaurs are extinct.
example_in_uzbek: Dinozavrlar yo'qolgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Dinozavrlar joq bolip ketken.

definition: To make a statement about what is likely to happen, often relating to the weather.
example_in_english: Is it difficult to forecast the weather?
example_in_uzbek: Havo sharoitini oldindan aytish qiyinmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Hawa-rayın aldın ala aytıw qıyın ba?

definition: A statement about what is likely to happen, often relating to the weather.
example_in_english: Have you heard the weather forecast for tomorrow?
example_in_uzbek: Ertangi ob-havo prognozini eshitdingizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Erteńgi hawa-rayı boljawın esittińiz be?

definition: Very cold, the temperature at which water freezes and becomes ice.
example_in_english: It's absolutely freezing in here.
example_in_uzbek: Bu yerda to'liq sovuq.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jerde tolıq suwıq.

definition: Including or affecting the whole world.
example_in_english: This is a global problem—it affects every country.
example_in_uzbek: Bu global muammo - har bir mamlakatga ta'sir qiladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul global mashqala - hár bir mámleketke tásir etedi.

definition: A continuous period of very hot weather.
example_in_english: Britain has been having a heatwave for the last three weeks.
example_in_uzbek: Britaniyada oxirgi uch hafta davomida issiq havo bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Britaniyada sońǵı úsh hápte dawamında ıssı hawa rayı boldı.

definition: A small animal that has six legs and often has wings.
example_in_english: Flies and mosquitoes are insects.
example_in_uzbek: Chivinlar va qong'izoqlar hasharotlar.
example_in_karakalpak: Shıbınlar hám qonızlaqlar - shıbın-shirkeyler.

definition: The bright flashes of light that you see in the sky during a storm.
example_in_english: The ship was struck by lightning soon after it left the port.
example_in_uzbek: Kema portdan chiqib ketgandan so'ng tezda chaqmoq urdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Keme porttan shıǵıp ketkennen keyin tezden shaqmaq urdı.

definition: To drop litter.
example_in_english: The sign said ""No littering.""
example_in_uzbek: Belgida ""Axlat tashlash taqiqlangan"" deb yozilgan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Belgide ""Shıǵındı taslaw qadaǵan etilgen"" dep jazılǵan edi.

definition: Things that people have dropped on the ground in a public place, making it untidy.
example_in_english: Pick up that litter and put it in the bin.
example_in_uzbek: O'sha axlatni olib, qutiga tashlang.
example_in_karakalpak: Sol shıǵındını alıp, qutıǵa taslań.

definition: In or related to a particular area, especially the place where you live.
example_in_english: Ask for the book in your local library.
example_in_uzbek: Mahalliy kutubxonada kitobni so'rang.
example_in_karakalpak: Jergilikli kitapxanadan kitaptı sorań.

definition: To find out the exact place where someone or something is, or to exist in a particular place.
example_in_english: The hotel is located in Wolverhampton town centre.
example_in_uzbek: Mehmonxona Wolverhampton shahar markazida joylashgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Miymanxana Vulverxempton qala orayında jaylasqan.

definition: An animal that is born from its mother's body, not from an egg, and drinks its mother's milk as a baby.
example_in_english: Humans and monkeys are mammals.
example_in_uzbek: Odamlar va maymunlar sutemizuvchilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Adamlar hám maymıllar sút emiziwshiler.

definition: Mild weather is warm and pleasant.
example_in_english: It was a mild winter.
example_in_uzbek: Qish yengil o'tdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Qıs jeńil ótti.

definition: To know and say what the name of someone or something is, or to give someone or something a name.
example_in_english: How many world capitals can you name?
example_in_uzbek: Nechta jahon poytaxtlarini ayta olasiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Neshe dúnya paytaxtların ayta alasız?

definition: A word or set of words used for referring to a person or thing.
example_in_english: What's the name of this flower?
example_in_uzbek: Ushbu gulning nomi nima?
example_in_karakalpak: Bul gúldiń atı ne?

definition: The place or moment at which something begins to exist.
example_in_english: Meteorites may hold clues about the origin of life on Earth.
example_in_uzbek: Meteoritlar Yer yuzidagi hayotning kelib chiqishi haqida izlar saqlashi mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Meteoritler Jer júzindegi tirishiliktiń kelip shıǵıwı haqqında izler saqlawı múmkin.

definition: A very large round object that moves around the Sun or around another star.
example_in_english: Mars is sometimes known as the red planet.
example_in_uzbek: Mars ba'zan qizil sayyora deb ataladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Mars geyde qızıl planeta dep ataladı.

definition: To take care of something in order to prevent it from being harmed or destroyed.
example_in_english: We work hard to preserve historic buildings.
example_in_uzbek: Tarixiy binolarni saqlash uchun qattiq ishlaymiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Tariyxıy imaratlardı saqlaw ushın qattı miynet etemiz.

definition: To treat waste materials so that they can be used again.
example_in_english: Let's recycle those old bottles.
example_in_uzbek: O'sha eski shishalarni qayta ishlaylik.
example_in_karakalpak: Sol eski shiyshelerdi qayta isleymiz.

definition: A type of animal such as a snake or lizard that lays eggs, and whose body is covered in scales.
example_in_english: Crocodiles are reptiles.
example_in_uzbek: Alligatorlar sudraluvchilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Alligatorlar jer bawırlawshılar.

definition: To save someone from a dangerous or unpleasant situation.
example_in_english: The crew of the ship were rescued just before it sank.
example_in_uzbek: Kemaning ekipaji kemaning cho'kishi oldidan qutqarildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kemeniń ekipaji kemeniń shógiw aldınan qutqarıldı.

definition: An act of saving someone or something from danger or from an unpleasant situation.
example_in_english: Firefighters carried out the dangerous rescue.
example_in_uzbek: Yong'inga qarshi kurashchilar xavfli qutqaruvni amalga oshirdilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Órtke qarsı gúresshiler qáwipli qutqarıwdı ámelge asırdı.

definition: An object that is sent into space to travel around the Earth to receive and send information; or a natural object like a moon that moves around a planet.
example_in_english: There are lots of satellites above the Earth.
example_in_uzbek: Yer ustida ko'plab sun'iy yo'ldoshlar mavjud.
example_in_karakalpak: Jer júzinde kóplegen jasalma joldaslar bar.

definition: A short period when it rains.
example_in_english: Tonight there's a 50 percent chance of showers.
example_in_uzbek: Bu kecha yomg'ir yog'ishi ehtimoli 50 foiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul túnde jawın jawıw itimalı 50 procent.

definition: The Sun and the group of planets that move around it.
example_in_english: How many planets are there in our solar system?
example_in_uzbek: Bizning quyosh sistemamizda nechta sayyora bor?
example_in_karakalpak: Biziń quyash sistemamızda neshe planeta bar?

definition: A plant or animal group whose members all have similar general features and are able to produce young plants or animals together.
example_in_english: Over 120 species of birds have been recorded in this national park.
example_in_uzbek: Ushbu milliy parkda 120 dan ortiq qush turi qayd etilgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul milliy parkte 120 dan aslam qus túri dizimge alınǵan.

definition: The loud noise that you sometimes hear in the sky during a storm.
example_in_english: Listen to that thunder!
example_in_uzbek: O'sha chaqmoqni eshiting!
example_in_karakalpak: Sol shaqmaqti esitiń!

definition: A wild animal or plant lives or grows on its own in natural conditions and is not raised by humans.
example_in_english: This behavior is common in both domestic and wild dogs.
example_in_uzbek: Bu xulq ham uy hayvonlari, ham yovvoyi itlarda keng tarqalgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul minez-qulıq hám úy haywanları, hám jabayı iytlerde keń tarqalgan.

definition: Animals, birds, and plants that live in natural conditions.
example_in_english: A lot of the local wildlife is in danger.
example_in_uzbek: Mahalliy yovvoyi hayvonlarning ko'pchiligi xavf ostida.
example_in_karakalpak: Jergilikli jabayı haywanlardıń kópshiligi qáwip astında.

definition: Funny or entertaining.
example_in_english: Jan sent me an amusing birthday card.
example_in_uzbek: Jan menga qiziqarli tug‘ilgan kun kartasini yubordi.
example_in_karakalpak: Jan maǵan qızıqlı tuwılǵan kún kartasın jiberdi.

definition: To make someone feel slightly angry or impatient.
example_in_english: I don't dislike her—she just annoys me sometimes.
example_in_uzbek: Men undan nafratlanmayman—u ba'zan meni asabiylashtiradi.
example_in_karakalpak: Men onı jek kórmeymen - ol geyde meni qıynaydı.

definition: Opinions or feelings that you show by your behavior.
example_in_english: We can win if we keep a positive attitude.
example_in_uzbek: Biz ijobiy ruhiyatni saqlasak, yutishimiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz unamlı ruwxıylıq saqlasaq, utıwımız múmkin.

definition: Made annoyed or angry very easily.
example_in_english: Relax and try not to be so bad-tempered.
example_in_uzbek: Dam oling va shunchalik g‘azablanmaslikka harakat qiling.
example_in_karakalpak: Dem alıń hám sonshelli ashıwlanbawǵa háreket etiń.

definition: To do things in a particular way.
example_in_english: The children behaved very badly.
example_in_uzbek: Bolalar juda yomon xulq-atvor ko'rsatdilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Balalar júdá jaman minez-qulıq kórsetti.

definition: To frighten or hurt someone who is smaller or weaker than you.
example_in_english: You shouldn't bully the other children in your class.
example_in_uzbek: Siz o'zingizning sinfingizdagi boshqa bolalarga zo'ravonlik qilmasligingiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz ózińizdiń klasınızdaǵı basqa balalarga kúsh kórsetpewińiz kerek.

definition: Someone who uses their strength or status to threaten or frighten people.
example_in_english: Leave him alone and don't be such a bully!
example_in_uzbek: Uni yolg'iz qoldiring va shunday zo'ravon bo'lmang!
example_in_karakalpak: Onı jalǵız qaldırıń hám sonday zor bolmań!

definition: Not affected by strong emotions.
example_in_english: ""Don't move and the snake won't attack,"" he said in a calm voice.
example_in_uzbek: ""Harakatlanmang, ilon hujum qilmaydi,"" dedi u tinch ovozda.
example_in_karakalpak: Háreketlenbeń, jılan shappaydı, dedi ol jay-paraxat dawıs penen.

definition: To do something enjoyable to show that an occasion or event is special.
example_in_english: Let's have a party to celebrate.
example_in_uzbek: Bayram qilish uchun partiya o‘tkazaylik.
example_in_karakalpak: Bayram etiw ushın partiya ótkereyik.

definition: The qualities that make up someone's personality.
example_in_english: Amy has got a really nice, friendly character.
example_in_uzbek: Amida juda yaxshi, do'stona xarakter bor.
example_in_karakalpak: Ámiyda júdá jaqsı, doslıq minez bar.

definition: Very unhappy and without any feelings of hope or enthusiasm.
example_in_english: She got very depressed after her husband left her.
example_in_uzbek: U erining uni tark etganidan so'ng juda tushkunlikka tushdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol kúewiniń onı taslap ketkennen keyin júdá túskinlikke tústi.

definition: Making you feel nervous, ashamed, or stupid.
example_in_english: What's the most embarrassing thing you've ever done?
example_in_uzbek: Sizning eng uyatli qilgan ishingiz nima?
example_in_karakalpak: Sizin eń uyatlı islegeniniz ne?

definition: A feeling that you experience, for example, love, fear, or anger.
example_in_english: Jealousy is an uncomfortable emotion.
example_in_uzbek: Hasad noqulay emotsiyadir.
example_in_karakalpak: Kúnshillik qolaysız emociya.

definition: Very interested in something or excited by it.
example_in_english: For a while, we were enthusiastic about the idea.
example_in_uzbek: Bir muddat biz g'oya haqida juda hayajonlandik.
example_in_karakalpak: Bir waqıt biz ideya haqqında júdá tolqınlandıq.

definition: An emotional state, for example, anger or happiness.
example_in_english: He found it difficult to express his feelings.
example_in_uzbek: U his-tuyg'ularini ifodalashda qiynaldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol sezimlerin bildiriwde qıylandı.

definition: Happy and pleased about something.
example_in_english: Maggie was glad to be home.
example_in_uzbek: Maggie uyda bo'lishdan xursand edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Maggie úyde bolıwdan quwanıshlı edi.

definition: To feel pain somewhere in your body.
example_in_english: Fred's knees hurt after walking all day.
example_in_uzbek: Fredning tizzalari butun kun yurib bo‘lgandan keyin og‘ridi.
example_in_karakalpak: Fredtiń dizeleri kún boyı júrgennen keyin awırdı.

definition: Injured, or feeling physical pain.
example_in_english: Two young men were badly hurt in the accident.
example_in_uzbek: Avariyada ikki yosh yigit yomon jarohatlandi.
example_in_karakalpak: Avariya waqtında eki jas jigit awır jaraqatlandı.

definition: Extremely unhappy.
example_in_english: He looked cold and miserable.
example_in_uzbek: U sovuq va qashshoq ko‘rindi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol suwıq hám jarlı kórindi.

definition: A naughty child behaves badly.
example_in_english: Sally was often naughty and got into trouble at school.
example_in_uzbek: Sally ko‘pincha yaramas bo‘lardi va maktabda muammolarga duch kelardi.
example_in_karakalpak: Salli kóbinese jaman bolatuǵın edi hám mektepte mashqalalarǵa dus keletuǵın edi.

definition: Making a lot of noise, or full of noise.
example_in_english: We have really noisy neighbors.
example_in_uzbek: Bizning juda shovqinli qo‘shnilarimiz bor.
example_in_karakalpak: Biziń júdá shawqımlı qońsılarımız bar.

definition: Behaving toward other people in a pleasant way that follows all the usual rules of society.
example_in_english: It's not polite to talk with your mouth full of food.
example_in_uzbek: O'zingizning og'zingiz to'la ovqat bilan gaplashish odobsizdir.
example_in_karakalpak: Ózińizdiń awzıńız tolı awqat penen sóylesiw ádepsizlik.

definition: To behave in a particular way because of things that are happening around you or things that other people are doing to you.
example_in_english: I wasn't sure how you would react.
example_in_uzbek: Sizning qanday reaktsiya berishingizni aniq bilmasdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Siziń qanday reakciya beretuǵınıńızdı anıq bilmedim.

definition: To feel sorry or sad about something that has happened, or about something that you have done.
example_in_english: We regret any problems caused by the delay.
example_in_uzbek: Kechikish tufayli yuzaga kelgan muammolar uchun afsusdamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Keshigiw sebepli kelip shıqqan mashqalalar ushın ókinish bildiremiz.

definition: A feeling of sadness about something that has happened or something that you have done.
example_in_english: Do you have any regrets about what you did?
example_in_uzbek: Qilgan ishingiz uchun qandaydir afsuslaringiz bormikin?
example_in_karakalpak: Islegen isińiz ushın qanday da bir ókinishlerińiz bar ma?

definition: Silly or unreasonable and deserving to be laughed at.
example_in_english: She looks absolutely ridiculous in that hat.
example_in_uzbek: U o'sha shapka bilan juda kulgili ko'rinadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol sol shapka menen júdá kúlkili kórinedi.

definition: Involving love, or making you have feelings of love.
example_in_english: We had a romantic dinner in an expensive restaurant.
example_in_uzbek: Biz qimmatbaho restoranda romantik kechki ovqat yedik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz qımbat bahalı restoranda romantikalıq keshki awqat jedik.

definition: Not polite.
example_in_english: I don't want to seem rude, but I'd rather be alone.
example_in_uzbek: Noqulay ko'rinmoqchi emasman, lekin yolg'iz bo'lishni afzal ko'raman.
example_in_karakalpak: Qolaysız kóriniwdi qálemeymen, biraq jalǵız bolıwdı abzal kóremen.

definition: The ability to laugh at things and recognize when they are funny.
example_in_english: Kev has got a great sense of humor and he makes me laugh all the time.
example_in_uzbek: Kevda ajoyib hazil tuyg‘usi bor va u meni doimo kuldiradi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kewda ájayıp házil sezimi bar hám ol meni bárqulla kúldiredi.

definition: Nervous and embarrassed in the company of other people, especially people who you do not know.
example_in_english: I'd love to meet her, but I'm too shy to introduce myself.
example_in_uzbek: Uni uchrashishni juda istayman, lekin tanishtirish uchun juda uyatchanman.
example_in_karakalpak: Onı ushıratıwdı júdá qáleymen, biraq tanıstırıwǵa júdá tartınaman.

definition: A worried or nervous feeling that makes you unable to relax, or a situation that makes you feel like this.
example_in_english: Carol's been under a lot of stress lately.
example_in_uzbek: Carol oxirgi paytlarda juda ko'p stressga duch kelmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Kerol sońǵı waqıtları júdá kóp stresske ushırap atır.

definition: To say a short story with a funny ending to make people laugh.
example_in_english: The kids were telling jokes.
example_in_uzbek: Bolalar hazillar aytishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Balalar háziller ayttı.

definition: To make someone feel sad, worried, or angry.
example_in_english: I'm sorry, I didn't mean to upset you.
example_in_uzbek: Kechirasiz, sizni asabiylashtirmoqchi emasdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Keshirersiz, men sizdi ashıwlandırmaqshı emes edim.

definition: Sad, worried, or angry about something.
example_in_english: It's nothing to get upset about.
example_in_uzbek: Buning uchun asabiylashishga hojat yo'q.
example_in_karakalpak: Bunıń ushın tınıshsızlanıwdıń keregi joq.

definition: An event, thing, or person that happens without being planned.
example_in_english: It was an accident; I didn’t do it on purpose.
example_in_uzbek: Bu tasodif edi; men maxsus qilmadim.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul tosınnan bolǵan edi; men arnawlı islemedim.

definition: To believe that something is true, even though you cannot be certain.
example_in_english: I assume everyone here has an email address.
example_in_uzbek: Bu yerda hammada elektron pochta manzili bor deb o'ylayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul jerde hámmede elektron pochta mánzili bar dep oylayman.

definition: To make something happen, usually something bad.
example_in_english: Bad weather continues to cause problems for travellers.
example_in_uzbek: Yomon ob-havo sayohatchilarga muammolar tug'dirishda davom etmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Jaman hawa-rayı sayaxachılarǵa mashqala tuwdırıwda dawam etpekte.

definition: An event, thing, or person that makes something happen.
example_in_english: We had to write an essay on the causes of the First World War.
example_in_uzbek: Biz Birinchi Jahon Urushining sabablarini yozishimiz kerak edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz Birinshi jáhán urısınıń sebeplerin jazıwımız kerek edi.

definition: To say that something is true, even though there is no definite proof.
example_in_english: He claims he is innocent.
example_in_uzbek: U o'zining aybsiz ekanini da'vo qiladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol ózin ayıpsız dep daǵazalaydı.

definition: To say that you are not happy about something.
example_in_english: She complained that it was too hot.
example_in_uzbek: U juda issiq ekanidan shikoyat qildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol júdá ıssı ekenliginen arız etti.

definition: To make someone believe that something is true, or to persuade someone to do something.
example_in_english: He failed to convince the judge that he was innocent.
example_in_uzbek: U sudyani o'zining aybsizligini ishonchli qila olmadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol sudyanı óziniń ayıpsız ekenligine isendire almadı.

definition: To say what you think is wrong or bad about something or someone.
example_in_english: Why are you always criticising me?
example_in_uzbek: Nega doimo meni tanqid qilayapsiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Nege mudamı meni kritikalay beresiz?

definition: To say that something is not true.
example_in_english: He still denies stealing the money.
example_in_uzbek: U hali ham pullarni o'g'irlashni rad etmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol ele pullardı urlawdan bas tartpaqta.

definition: A conversation about something important.
example_in_english: We need to have a discussion about your schoolwork.
example_in_uzbek: Biz sizning maktab ishingiz haqida suhbatlashishimiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz siziń mektep jumısıńız haqqında sóylesiwimiz kerek.

definition: To think that something is probably not true, probably does not exist, or probably will not happen.
example_in_english: Do you think they'll win? I doubt it.
example_in_uzbek: Sizningcha ular yutadi? Men shubhalanaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Sizińshe olar utadı? Men gúmanlanaman.

definition: A feeling of not being certain about something.
example_in_english: There's no doubt about it—we're in trouble.
example_in_uzbek: Bunda shubha yo'q—biz muammodamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Bunda gúman joq - biz mashqaladamız.

definition: To give someone confidence or hope.
example_in_english: Mum always encouraged us when we took part in competitions.
example_in_uzbek: Ona har doim musobaqalarda qatnashganimizda bizni rag'batlantirardi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ana hár dayım jarıslarǵa qatnasqanımızda bizlerdi xoshametleytuǵın edi.

definition: To throw away, give away, or sell something that you no longer want or need.
example_in_english: We're moving, so we have to get rid of a lot of our furniture.
example_in_uzbek: Biz ko'chmoqdamiz, shuning uchun ko'p mebellardan voz kechishimiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz kóshpektemiz, sonıń ushın kóp mebellerden waz keshiwimiz kerek.

definition: To talk about other people or about things that are not important.
example_in_english: You shouldn't gossip about people.
example_in_uzbek: Siz boshqalar haqida mish-mish qilmang.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz basqalar haqqında mısh-mısh etpeń.

definition: Talk or a conversation about things that are not important or about people's private lives.
example_in_english: Here's an interesting piece of gossip for you.
example_in_uzbek: Siz uchun qiziqarli mish-mish shu yerda.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz ushın qızıqlı mısh-mısh usı jerde.

definition: Perfect.
example_in_english: Upgrading your computer seems the ideal solution.
example_in_uzbek: Kompyuteringizni yangilash ideal yechim kabi ko'rinadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kompyuterinizdi jańalaw ideal sheshim sıyaqlı kórinedi.

definition: To say or do something that is offensive.
example_in_english: You'll insult the cook if you don't at least taste the meal.
example_in_uzbek: Agar siz taomni tatmasangiz, oshpazni haqorat qilasiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Eger siz taǵamdı tatpasańız, aspazdı qorlaǵan bolasız.

definition: An offensive remark.
example_in_english: I've never heard such a dreadful insult.
example_in_uzbek: Men hech qachon bunday dahshatli haqoratni eshitmaganman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men hesh qashan bunday qorqınıshlı sózlerdi esitpegen edim.

definition: To try to find out all the facts about something in order to learn the truth about it.
example_in_english: We sent a reporter to investigate the rumour.
example_in_uzbek: Biz mish-mishni tergash uchun reporterni yubordik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz ósekti tekseriw ushın xabarshını jiberdik.

definition: Harmful or bad.
example_in_english: Does TV have a negative effect on children?
example_in_uzbek: Televizion bolalarga salbiy ta'sir ko'rsatadimi?
example_in_karakalpak: Televidenie balalarǵa unamsız tásir kórsete me?

definition: A positive experience, situation, result, etc., is a good one.
example_in_english: School was a totally positive experience for me.
example_in_uzbek: Maktab men uchun butunlay ijobiy tajriba bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Mektep men ushın pútkilley unamlı tájiriybe boldı.

definition: To express strong approval or admiration for someone or something.
example_in_english: If you never praise your kids, how can they know when they're doing something right?
example_in_uzbek: Agar siz hech qachon bolalaringizni maqtamasangiz, ular qanday to'g'ri ish qilayotganini qanday bilishadi?
example_in_karakalpak: Eger siz hesh qashan balalarıńızdı maqtawsız bolsańız, olar qanday durıs is islep atırǵanın qalay biledi?

definition: An expression of strong approval or admiration.
example_in_english: I never got much praise as a child.
example_in_uzbek: Men bolaligimda ko'p maqtov olmaganman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men balalıǵımda kóp marapat alǵanım joq.

definition: To behave in a particular way because you want someone to believe that something is true when it is not.
example_in_english: She closed her eyes and pretended to be asleep.
example_in_uzbek: U ko'zlarini yumib, uxlayapti deb qildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol kózlerin jumıp, uyıqlap atır dep oyladı.

definition: An aim or use.
example_in_english: The purpose of this dictionary is to help students of English.
example_in_uzbek: Ushbu lug'atning maqsadi ingliz tili talabalariga yordam berishdir.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul sózliktiń maqseti inglis tili studentlerine járdem beriw bolıp tabıladı.

definition: To say that you will not do or accept something, or will not let someone do something.
example_in_english: I asked him to apologise, but he refused.
example_in_uzbek: Men undan uzr so'rashini so‘radim, lekin u rad etdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Men onnan keshirim sorawın soradım, biraq ol bas tarttı.

definition: To cause or produce something.
example_in_english: The fight resulted in three people being hurt.
example_in_uzbek: Jang natijasida uch kishi jarohatlandi.
example_in_karakalpak: Sawash nátiyjesinde úsh adam jaraqatlandı.

definition: Something that is caused directly by something else.
example_in_english: He said the argument was the result of a misunderstanding.
example_in_uzbek: U munozara tushunmovchilik natijasi ekanini aytdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol tartıs túsinbewshilik nátiyjesi ekenin ayttı.

definition: Something that people are saying that may or may not be true.
example_in_english: A student had been spreading rumours about the teachers.
example_in_uzbek: Bir talaba o'qituvchilar haqida mish-mishlar tarqatmoqda edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bir student oqıtıwshılar haqqında mısh-mıshlar tarqatıp atır edi.

definition: Reasonable and practical.
example_in_english: This seems to be a sensible way of dealing with the problem.
example_in_uzbek: Bu muammoni hal qilishning aqlli yo'li kabi ko'rinadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul mashqalanı sheshiwdiń aqıllı jolı sıyaqlı kórinedi.

definition: Bad or dangerous enough to make you worried.
example_in_english: It's not a serious problem.
example_in_uzbek: Bu jiddiy muammo emas.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul úlken mashqala emes.

definition: Kept in addition to other similar things, so that you can use it if you need it.
example_in_english: Bring a towel and some spare clothes.
example_in_uzbek: Sochiq va qo'shimcha kiyimlarni olib keling.
example_in_karakalpak: Súlgi hám qosımsha kiyimlerdi alıp keliń.

definition: An idea that you believe is true, although you have no proof.
example_in_english: I have my own theory about why he left.
example_in_uzbek: Nega u ketganligi haqida o'zimning nazariyam bor.
example_in_karakalpak: Ne ushın ol ketkenligi haqqında ózimniń teoriyam bar.

definition: A word, idea, or image that comes into your mind.
example_in_english: I've just had an interesting thought.
example_in_uzbek: Yangi qiziqarli fikr paydo bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Jańa qızıqlı pikir payda boldı.

definition: To tell someone about a possible problem or danger, so that they can avoid it or deal with it.
example_in_english: Police are warning everyone in the area to take extra care when going out alone.
example_in_uzbek: Politsiya hududdagi har bir kishiga yolg'iz chiqishda ehtiyot bo'lishni ogohlantirmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Policiya aymaqtaǵı hár bir adamǵa jeke shıǵıwda abaylı bolıwdı eskertpekte.

definition: to find the total of something
example_in_english: The shop assistant added up what I bought and told me the total.
example_in_uzbek: Do'kon yordamchisi sotib olgan narsalarimni hisoblab, umumiy miqdorni aytdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Dúkán assistenti satıp algan zatlarımdı esaplap, uliwma muģdardı ayttı.

definition: to explode
example_in_english: Luckily, the bomb didn't blow up.
example_in_uzbek: Yaxshiyamki, bomba portlamadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Jaqsı bolganı, bomba jarılmadı.

definition: to stop working (for a machine, etc)
example_in_english: Our car broke down on the motorway.
example_in_uzbek: Bizning mashinamiz avtomobil yo'lida buzilib qoldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Biziń mashinamız avtomobil jolında buzılıp qaldı.

definition: to enter illegally
example_in_english: A house in Brecon Place was broken into last night.
example_in_uzbek: Kechasi Brecon Place'dagi bir uy o'g'irlab ketildi.
example_in_karakalpak: Túnde Brecon Pleystegi bir úy urlanıp ketildi.

definition: to take care of a child until adulthood
example_in_english: She brought up three sons on her own.
example_in_uzbek: U uchta o'g'ilni o'zi yetishtirdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol úsh uldı ózi tárbiyaladı.

definition: to increase
example_in_english: These exercises are good for building up leg strength.
example_in_uzbek: Bu mashqlar oyoq kuchini oshirish uchun yaxshi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul shınıǵıwlar ayaq kúshin arttırıw ushın jaqsı.

definition: to ring again on the phone
example_in_english: I'll call you back later when you're not so busy.
example_in_uzbek: Men sizni keyinroq qaytib chaqiraman, siz band bo'lmaganingizda.
example_in_karakalpak: Men sizdi keyinirek qaytıp shaqıraman, siz bánt bolmaǵanıńızda.

definition: to cancel
example_in_english: The concert has been called off because of the weather.
example_in_uzbek: Konsert ob-havo tufayli bekor qilindi.
example_in_karakalpak: Koncert hawa rayı sebepli biykar etildi.

definition: to become/make calmer
example_in_english: The woman finally calmed down and explained what had happened.
example_in_uzbek: Ayol nihoyat tinchlandi va nima bo'lganini tushuntirdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Hayal aqırında tınıshlandı hám ne bolǵanın túsindirdi.

definition: to continue
example_in_english: The phone rang, but Mark just carried on watching TV.
example_in_uzbek: Telefon chalingan edi, lekin Mark TV tomosha qilishni davom ettirdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Telefon shıńǵırlaǵan edi, biraq Mark televizor tamasha etiwdi dawam etti.

definition: to reach the same point/level as
example_in_english: He's missed so much school that he's going to find it hard to catch up.
example_in_uzbek: U juda ko'p maktabni qoldirib qo'ydi, shuning uchun orqada qolishni qiyinlashtiradi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol júdá kóp mektepti qaldırdı, sonıń ushın artta qalıwdı qıyınlastıradı.

definition: to become/make happier
example_in_english: I started to cheer up when the sun came out.
example_in_uzbek: Quyosh chiqqanda men kayfiyatimni ko'tarishni boshladim.
example_in_karakalpak: Quyash shıqqanda men keypiyatımdı kótere basladım.

definition: to tidy
example_in_english: I'll clear up if you want to go to bed.
example_in_uzbek: Agar siz yotmoqchi bo'lsangiz, men tozalayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Eger siz jatpaqshı bolsańız, men tazalayman.

definition: to find something by chance
example_in_english: I came across a word I'd never seen before.
example_in_uzbek: Men ilgari ko'rmagan bir so'zni topdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men burın kórmegen bir sóz taptım.

definition: to return (from)
example_in_english: Give me a call when you come back from Greece.
example_in_uzbek: Yunonistonga qaytgandan keyin menga qo'ng'iroq qiling.
example_in_karakalpak: Greciyaǵa qaytqannan keyin maǵan qońıraw etiń.

definition: to be quicker
example_in_english: Come on, or we'll be late!
example_in_uzbek: Keling, aks holda kechikamiz!
example_in_karakalpak: Keliń, bolmasa keshikemiz!

definition: to be published
example_in_english: When does her new book come out?
example_in_uzbek: Uning yangi kitobi qachon chiqadi?
example_in_karakalpak: Onıń jańa kitabı qashan shıǵadı?

definition: to draw a line through something written
example_in_english: Just cross it out and rewrite it correctly.
example_in_uzbek: Uni chizib tashlang va to'g'ri yozing.
example_in_karakalpak: Oni sızıp taslań hám duris jaziń.

definition: to do less of something (smoking, etc)
example_in_english: I'm trying to cut down on the amount of sugar I eat.
example_in_uzbek: Men iste'mol qiladigan shakar miqdorini qisqartirishga harakat qilmoqdaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men qabıl etetuǵın qumsheker muǵdarın qısqartıwǵa háreket etip atırman.

definition: to disconnect (phone, electricity, etc)
example_in_english: Pay the electricity bill tomorrow or they might cut us off.
example_in_uzbek: Ertaga elektr hisob-fakturangizni to'lang, aks holda bizni uzib qo'yishlari mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Erteń elektr-fakturańızdı tóleń, bolmasa bizdi úzip qoyıwı múmkin.

definition: to completely remove by cutting
example_in_english: Keep your roses healthy by cutting off any dead flowers.
example_in_uzbek: Qizilg'ullarning sog'lig'ini saqlang, o'lik gullarni kesib oling.
example_in_karakalpak: Qızılgúllerdiń densawlıǵın saqlań, óli gúllerdi kesip alıń.

definition: to button/zip up a piece of clothing
example_in_english: It's very windy, so do your coat up.
example_in_uzbek: Juda shamolli, shuning uchun paltoingizni tugmang.
example_in_karakalpak: Júdá samallı, sonıń ushın paltonıńdı túymemeń.

definition: to eat at a restaurant
example_in_english: Would you like to stay in or eat out tonight?
example_in_uzbek: Kechqurun uyda qolishni yoki tashqarida ovqatlanishni xohlaysizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Keshte úyde qalıwdı yamasa sırtta awqatlanıwdı qáleysiz be?

definition: to trip and fall
example_in_english: I fell down and hurt my knee.
example_in_uzbek: Men yiqildim va tizzamni jarohatladim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men jıǵıldım hám dizemdi jaraladım.

definition: to have an argument and stop being friends
example_in_english: Have you two fallen out?
example_in_uzbek: Siz ikkovingiz o'zaro janjallashdingizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Sizler ekewińiz óz ara jánjellestińiz be?

definition: to add information in a form
example_in_english: Just fill in this application form, please.
example_in_uzbek: Iltimos, ushbu ariza formasini to'ldiring.
example_in_karakalpak: Iltimas, usı arza formasın toltırıń.

definition: to make something completely full
example_in_english: Just fill this bowl up with sugar and put it on the table.
example_in_uzbek: Bu idishni shakar bilan to'ldirib, stolga qo'ying.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul ıdıstı qumsheker menen toltırıp, stolǵa qoyıń.

definition: to discover information, etc.
example_in_english: I don't want Jerry to find out about this.
example_in_uzbek: Men Jerryning buni bilishini xohlamayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Jerriniń bunı biliwin qálemeymen.

definition: to escape punishment for
example_in_english: They have repeatedly broken the law and got away with it.
example_in_uzbek: Ular qonunni qayta-qayta buzib, jazolanishdan qochib ketishdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Olar nızamdı qayta-qayta buzıp, jazadan qashıp ketti.

definition: to enter a car
example_in_english: I hurt my head as I was getting into the car.
example_in_uzbek: Mashinaga kirayotganimda boshimni jarohatladim.
example_in_karakalpak: Mashinaǵa kirip atırǵanımda basımnan jaraqat aldım.

definition: to leave a bus/train/etc
example_in_english: You need to get off the bus opposite the supermarket.
example_in_uzbek: Siz supermarket qarshisidagi avtobusda tushishingiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz supermarket aldındaǵı avtobusta túsiwińiz kerek.

definition: to have a good relationship (with)
example_in_english: She seems to get on with everybody.
example_in_uzbek: U hammaga yaxshi muomala qiladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol hámmege jaqsı múnásibette boladı.

definition: to enter a bus/train/etc
example_in_english: You can buy a ticket when you get on the bus.
example_in_uzbek: Siz avtobusga chiqish vaqtida chipta sotib olishingiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz avtobusqa miniw waqtında bilet satıp alıwıńız múmkin.

definition: to leave a car/building/room/etc
example_in_english: Quick! Get out of the car!
example_in_uzbek: Tez! Mashinadan chiqib keting!
example_in_karakalpak: Tez! Mashinadan shıǵıń!

definition: to recover from (an illness, etc)
example_in_english: It can take weeks to get over an illness like that.
example_in_uzbek: Bunday kasallikni yengish bir necha hafta davom etishi mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Bunday kesellikti jeńiw bir neshe hápte dawam etiwi múmkin.

definition: to leave your bed
example_in_english: He never gets up before nine.
example_in_uzbek: U hech qachon to'qqizdan oldin turmaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol hesh qashan toǵızdan burın turmaydı.

definition: to give something free of charge
example_in_english: They're giving away free tickets at the cinema!
example_in_uzbek: Kinoteatrda bepul chipta tarqatishmoqda!
example_in_karakalpak: Kinoteatrda biypul bilet tarqatıp atır!

definition: to return something you've taken/borrowed
example_in_english: Could you give my CDs back because you've had them for two weeks.
example_in_uzbek: Iltimos, ikki haftadan buyon sizda bo'lgan CD-larimni qaytarib bering.
example_in_karakalpak: Iltimas, eki hápteden berli sizde bolǵan CD lerimdi qaytarıp beriń.

definition: to stop doing something you do regularly
example_in_english: You should give up smoking.
example_in_uzbek: Chekishni tashlash kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Shegiwdi taslaw kerek.

definition: to leave a place/someone
example_in_english: Why don't you just go away and leave me alone?
example_in_uzbek: Nega shunchaki ketib, meni yolg'iz qoldirmaysiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Nege tek ketip, meni jalǵız qaldırmaysız?

definition: to return (to)
example_in_english: I can't wait to go back to Italy.
example_in_uzbek: Men Italiyaga qaytishni sabrsizlik bilan kutyapman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Italiyaǵa qaytıwdı sabırsızlıq penen kútip atırman.

definition: to no longer be fresh
example_in_english: Has this milk gone off?
example_in_uzbek: Bu sut eskirib ketdimi?
example_in_karakalpak: Bul sút gónerip ketken be?

definition: to continue happening or doing something
example_in_english: Please go on with your work while I speak to the head teacher.
example_in_uzbek: Men maktab direktori bilan gaplashayotganimda, siz ishni davom ettiring, iltimos.
example_in_karakalpak: Men mektep direktorı menen sóylesip atırǵanımda, siz jumıstı dawam ettiriń, iltimas.

definition: to happen
example_in_english: There isn't much going on in this town in the evening.
example_in_uzbek: Kechqurun bu shaharda ko'p narsalar bo'lmaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Keshte bul qalada kóp nárseler bolmaydı.

definition: to stop burning
example_in_english: The fire must have gone out during the night.
example_in_uzbek: O'g'ri tun davomida o'chishi kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Urı tún ishinde óshiwi kerek.

definition: to be the boyfriend/girlfriend of
example_in_english: Greg used to go out with Katy.
example_in_uzbek: Greg Katy bilan uchrashardi.
example_in_karakalpak: Greg Katı menen ushırasatuǵın edi.

definition: to become older (for children)
example_in_english: He rarely saw his father while he was growing up.
example_in_uzbek: U ulg'ayganida kamdan-kam otasini ko'rardi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol úlkeygeninde ákesin siyrek kóretuǵın edi.

definition: to wait
example_in_english: Just hang on - I'll be ready in a minute.
example_in_uzbek: Kuting - men bir daqiqada tayyor bo'laman.
example_in_karakalpak: Kútiń - men bir minutta tayar bolaman.

definition: to put clothes in a wardrobe, etc
example_in_english: The women hung up their coats and sat down.
example_in_uzbek: Ayollar o'z palto'larini osib, o'tirdilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Hayallar óz paltosın ildirip, otırdı.

definition: to put the receiver down to end a phone call
example_in_english: I can't believe that Jessica hung up without saying goodbye!
example_in_uzbek: Jessica xayrlashmasdan telefonni yopganini ishonmayapman!
example_in_karakalpak: Jessika xoshlaspastan telefondı jawǵanına isenbeymen!

definition: to wear (a piece of clothing)
example_in_english: The man had a strange hat on.
example_in_uzbek: Erkakda g'alati shapka bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Er adamda ájeptáwir shapka bar edi.

definition: to do something more quickly
example_in_english: We haven't got much time, so hurry up!
example_in_uzbek: Bizda ko'p vaqt qolmagan, shuning uchun tezroq qiling!
example_in_karakalpak: Bizde kóp waqıt qalmaǵan, sonıń ushın tezirek isleń!

definition: to participate, take part
example_in_english: Ask them if you can play - I'm sure they'll let you join in.
example_in_uzbek: Ulardan o'ynashim mumkinligini so'rang - men ishonamanki, ular sizni qo'shishadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Olardan oynawım múmkin be ekenligin sorań - men isenemen, olar sizdi qosadı.

definition: to prevent from entering
example_in_english: Cars should be kept out of the city centre.
example_in_uzbek: Avtomobillar shahar markazidan chiqarilishi kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Avtomobiller qala orayınan shıǵarılıwı kerek.

definition: to not include
example_in_english: Don't leave your brother out - let him play with you and your friends.
example_in_uzbek: Akangni chetda qoldirmang - uni siz bilan o'ynashga ruxsat bering.
example_in_karakalpak: Aǵandı shette qaldırma - onıń siz benen oynawına ruxsat berin.

definition: to disappoint
example_in_english: You've really let me down.
example_in_uzbek: Siz meni juda xafa qildingiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz meni júdá qapa ettińiz.

definition: to start lying (on a bed, etc)
example_in_english: I'm going to go and lie down for a while.
example_in_uzbek: Men bir oz vaqt yotishga boraman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men biraz waqıt jatıwǵa baraman.

definition: to disconnect from the Internet/a website
example_in_english: Don't forget to log off when you've finished checking your e-mail.
example_in_uzbek: E-pochta tekshirilgandan so'ng, tizimdan chiqishni unutmang.
example_in_karakalpak: Elektron pochta tekserilgennen keyin, sistemadan shiǵiwdi umitpań.

definition: to connect to the Internet/a website
example_in_english: You need your password to log on.
example_in_uzbek: Tizimga kirish uchun parolingiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Sistemaǵa kiriw ushın paroliniz kerek.

definition: to take care of
example_in_english: It's hard work looking after three children all day.
example_in_uzbek: Butun kun uchta bolani qarash juda qiyin.
example_in_karakalpak: Pútkil kún úsh balanı kútiw júdá qıyın.

definition: to try to find information in a book, etc
example_in_english: I had to look the word up in a dictionary.
example_in_uzbek: Men so'zni lug'atdan qidirishga to'g'ri keldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Men sózdi sózlikte izlewge tuura keldi.

definition: to invent an explanation, excuse, etc
example_in_english: He made up some excuse about the dog eating his homework.
example_in_uzbek: U itning uy vazifasini yeyayotgani haqida bahona uydirdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol iyttiń úy tapsırmasın jep atırǵanı haqqında báne oylap taptı.

definition: to start living in a new house, etc
example_in_english: We're moving in next week.
example_in_uzbek: Biz kelasi hafta ko'chib o'tamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Bizler kelesi háptede kóship ótemiz.

definition: to return money (to someone)
example_in_english: Did you pay Denise back?
example_in_uzbek: Siz Denise'ni to'ladingizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz Denizge tólediniz be?

definition: to lift something from the floor, a table, etc
example_in_english: Please pick those toys up and put them away.
example_in_uzbek: Iltimos, o'sha o'yinchoqlarni yig'ing va ularni joyiga qo'ying.
example_in_karakalpak: Iltimas, sol oyinshiqlardı jiynań hám olardı ornına qoyıń.

definition: to tell someone important information
example_in_english: He pointed out that we had two hours of free time before dinner.
example_in_uzbek: U kechki ovqatgacha ikkita soat bo'sh vaqtimiz borligini ko'rsatdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol keshki awqatqa shekem eki saat bos waqtımız bar ekenligin kórsetti.

definition: to make a paper copy of something on a computer
example_in_english: Let me print those photographs out for you.
example_in_uzbek: Men siz uchun o'sha rasmlarni chop etishga ruxsat bering.
example_in_karakalpak: Men siz ushın sol súwretlerdi basıp shıǵarıwǵa ruqsat etiń.

definition: to break by pulling
example_in_english: I pulled off the arm of my sunglasses by mistake.
example_in_uzbek: Men ko'zoynaging qo'lini xato bilan tortib oldim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men kózáynegińniń qolın qáte menen tartıp aldım.

definition: to return something to where it belongs
example_in_english: He put the notebook away and stood up.
example_in_uzbek: U daftarni joyiga qo'ydi va turdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol dápterdi ornına qoydı hám túrgeldi.

definition: to return something to where it was
example_in_english: Can you put the book back when you've finished with it?
example_in_uzbek: Kitobni tugatganingizda uni o'rniga qo'ysangiz bo'ladimi?
example_in_karakalpak: Kitaptı tamamlaǵanıńızda onı ornına qoysańız bola ma?

definition: to stop holding
example_in_english: Emma put her bag down and went upstairs.
example_in_uzbek: Emma sumkasini qo'ydi va yuqoriga chiqdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Emma sumkasın qoydı hám joqarıǵa shıqtı.

definition: to delay to a later time
example_in_english: Can we put the meeting off until tomorrow?
example_in_uzbek: Uchrashuvni ertagacha kechiktira olishimiz mumkinmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Ushırasıwdı erteńge qaldıra alıwımız múmkin be?

definition: to gain (weight)
example_in_english: I don't want to put on any more weight!
example_in_uzbek: Men yana vazn qo'shishni xohlamayman!
example_in_karakalpak: Men jáne salmaq qosıwdı qálemeymen!

definition: to start wearing (a piece of clothing)
example_in_english: Put your gloves and scarf on - it's cold outside.
example_in_uzbek: Qo'lqop va sharfingizni kiying - tashqarida sovuq.
example_in_karakalpak: Qolǵap hám sharfıńızdı kiyiń - dalada suwıq.

definition: to make something stop burning
example_in_english: It took three firefighters to put the fire out.
example_in_uzbek: Yaxshi olovni o'chirish uchun uch nafar o'choqchi kerak bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Jaqsı ottı óshiriw ushın úsh oshaqshı kerek boldı.

definition: to put something on a wall (e.g. a picture)
example_in_english: The teachers will put a notice up about the new courses.
example_in_uzbek: O'qituvchilar yangi kurslar haqida e'lonni osadilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Oqıtıwshılar jańa kurslar haqqında daǵaza qıstırdı.

definition: to say something out loud which you are reading
example_in_english: He read the list of names out.
example_in_uzbek: U ismlar ro'yxatini o'qidi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol atlar dizimin oqıdı.

definition: to tear into pieces
example_in_english: Rip up this piece of paper when you've finished reading it.
example_in_uzbek: O'qib bo'lgandan so'ng bu qog'ozni yirtib tashlang.
example_in_karakalpak: Oqıp bolǵannan soń bul qaǵazdı jırtıp taslań.

definition: to remove with a rubber
example_in_english: I can't rub it out because I wrote it in pen.
example_in_uzbek: Men uni o'chira olmayman, chunki men uni qalam bilan yozganman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men onı óshire almayman, sebebi men onı qálem menen jazǵanman.

definition: to escape by running
example_in_english: The thief ran away from the police officers.
example_in_uzbek: O'g'rining politsiyachilardan qochib ketdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Urınıń policiyashılardan qashıp ketti.

definition: to not have any left
example_in_english: Many hospitals are running out of money.
example_in_uzbek: Ko'plab kasalxonalar puldan qutulmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Kóplegen emlewxanalar puldan qutılmaqta.

definition: to save money (for a specific purpose)
example_in_english: I'm saving up for a new electric guitar.
example_in_uzbek: Men yangi elektr gitara uchun pul to'playapman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men jańa elektr gitara ushın pul jıynap atırman.

definition: to make a player leave a game (e.g. football)
example_in_english: It was a very bad foul and the referee sent the player off.
example_in_uzbek: Bu juda yomon xato edi va hakam o'yinchini maydondan chiqarib yubordi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul júdá jaman qátelik edi hám tóreshi oyınshını maydannan shıǵarıp jiberdi.

definition: to start a journey
example_in_english: Go to sleep because we're setting off early in the morning.
example_in_uzbek: Uxlashing kerak, chunki ertalab biz erta ketamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Uyqılawıń kerek, sebebi azanda biz erte ketemiz.

definition: to start (a business, organization, etc)
example_in_english: My dad is going to set up a taxi company.
example_in_uzbek: Dadam taksi kompaniyasini tashkil etmoqchi.
example_in_karakalpak: Aǵam taksi kompaniyasın shólkemlestirmekshi.

definition: to give a part of something to a group of people
example_in_english: The money will be shared out between 30 different environmental organizations.
example_in_uzbek: Pul 30 xil ekologik tashkilot o'rtasida taqsimlanadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Pul 30 túrli ekologiyalıq shólkemler arasında bólistiriledi.

definition: to stop talking, stop making a noise
example_in_english: Just shut up a minute and let me tell you what happened!
example_in_uzbek: Bir daqiqa jim bo'ling va nima bo'lganini aytishga ruxsat bering!
example_in_karakalpak: Bir minut úndemeń hám ne bolǵanın aytıwǵa ruxsat etiń!

definition: to (start to) sit
example_in_english: Please, sit down and make yourselves comfortable.
example_in_uzbek: Iltimos, o'tiring va o'zingizni qulay tuting.
example_in_karakalpak: Iltimas, otırıń hám ózińizdi qolay tutıń.

definition: to solve a problem
example_in_english: Investigators are still trying to sort out why the accident happened.
example_in_uzbek: Tekshiruvchilar haligacha baxtsiz hodisaning sabablarini aniqlashga harakat qilishmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Tekseriwshiler elege shekem baxıcız hádiyseniń sebeplerin anıqlawǵa háreket etpekte.

definition: to talk more loudly so someone can hear you
example_in_english: You have to speak up a bit because my gran’s a bit deaf.
example_in_uzbek: Siz biroz balandroq gapirishingiz kerak, chunki bujibim biroz kar.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz biraz qattıraq sóylewińiz kerek, sebebi bujim biraz gereń.

definition: to end a relationship
example_in_english: Tommy and Liz have just split up. It's very sad!
example_in_uzbek: Tommy va Liz endi ajrashdi. Bu juda xafa bo'ldim!
example_in_karakalpak: Tommi hám Liz endi ajırasqan. Bul júdá qapa boldım!

definition: to (start to) stand
example_in_english: You have the chair. I don’t mind eating standing up.
example_in_uzbek: Siz o'zingizda o'tiring. Men turib ovqatlanishni muammo qilmayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz ózińizde otırıń. Men turıp awqatlanıwdı mashqala etpeymen.

definition: to go to bed late
example_in_english: We stayed up until two o'clock last night.
example_in_uzbek: Biz kechasi ikki gacha turdik.
example_in_karakalpak: Bizler túngi ekige shekem turdıq.

definition: to remove
example_in_english: Have they taken the rubbish away yet?
example_in_uzbek: Ular chiqindilarni olib ketdimi?
example_in_karakalpak: Olar shıǵındılardı alıp ketti me?

definition: to return something to the place it came from
example_in_english: I'm going to take my library books back.
example_in_uzbek: Men kutubxona kitoblarimni qaytarishga boraman.
