example_in_karakalpak: Men kitapxana kitaplarımdı qaytarıwǵa baraman.

definition: to remove (from a high place)
example_in_english: The old man took a large book down from a shelf.
example_in_uzbek: Qariya katta kitobni javondan oldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ǵarrı úlken kitaptı shkaftan aldı.

definition: to leave the ground
example_in_english: Let's go and watch the planes taking off while we wait.
example_in_uzbek: Kutilgan paytimizda uchayotgan samolyotlarni ko'rishga boraylik.
example_in_karakalpak: Kútilgen waqtımızda ushıp baratırǵan samolyotlardı kóriwge barayıq.

definition: to remove (a piece of clothing)
example_in_english: It felt good to finally take my shoes off after a long day.
example_in_uzbek: Uzun kunlikdan so'ng nihoyat poyabzalni yechish yaxshi his qilindi.
example_in_karakalpak: Uzaq kúnnen keyin aqırında ayaq kiyimdi sheshiw jaqsı sezildi.

definition: to take control of (a business, etc)
example_in_english: The shopping centre has been taken over by an American company.
example_in_uzbek: Savdo markazi amerikalik kompaniya tomonidan egallandi.
example_in_karakalpak: Sawda orayı amerikalı kompaniya tárepinen iyelendi.

definition: to start (a hobby, sport, etc)
example_in_english: I've taken up stamp collecting and it’s really interesting.
example_in_uzbek: Men tamg'a yig'ishni boshladim va bu juda qiziqarli.
example_in_karakalpak: Men tamǵa jıynawdı basladım hám bul júdá qızıqlı.

definition: to put something in a rubbish bin
example_in_english: Have you thrown the papers away?
example_in_uzbek: Siz qog'ozlarni tashladingizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz qaǵazlardı tasladıńız ba?

definition: to put on (a piece of clothing) to see how it looks
example_in_english: You should try it on to see if it's the right size.
example_in_uzbek: Bu sizga mos kelishini tekshirish uchun kiyib ko'rishingiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul sizge sáykes keliwin tekserip kóriw ushın kiyip kóriwińiz kerek.

definition: to lower the volume of
example_in_english: Turn the radio down - I'm trying to work.
example_in_uzbek: Radio balandligini kamaytiring - men ishlashni davom ettiraman.
example_in_karakalpak: Radio bálentligin kemeytiń - men islewdi dawam etemen.

definition: to stop a machine working
example_in_english: Will you turn the television off, please?
example_in_uzbek: Iltimos, televizorni o'chirsangiz bo'ladimi?
example_in_karakalpak: Iltimas, televizordı óshire alasız ba?

definition: to start a machine working
example_in_english: Will you turn the television on, please?
example_in_uzbek: Iltimos, televizorni yoqsangiz bo'ladimi?
example_in_karakalpak: Iltimas, televizordı jaǵıwıńız múmkin be?

definition: to turn something so the other side is towards you
example_in_english: You may turn over your exam papers now.
example_in_uzbek: Endi imtihon qog'ozlaringizni aylantirishingiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Endi ekzamen qaǵazlarıńızdı aylandırıwıńız múmkin.

definition: to increase the volume of
example_in_english: We asked our teacher to turn the CD up, so that we could hear it.
example_in_uzbek: Biz o'qituvchimizdan CD-ni balandroq ovozga qo'yishni so'radik, shunda uni eshitishimiz mumkin bo'ldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz muģallimimizden CD di qattıraq dawısqa qoyiwdi soradıq, sonda oni esitiwimiz múmkin boldi.

definition: to stop being asleep
example_in_english: Wake up! It's nearly ten o'clock!
example_in_uzbek: Uyaning! Soat deyarli o'n bitta!
example_in_karakalpak: Uyalıń! Saat derlik on bir!

definition: to wash plates, cups, cutlery, etc
example_in_english: I can help to cook and wash up.
example_in_uzbek: Men ovqat pishirish va idish-tovoqlarni yuvishda yordam bera olaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men awqat pisiriw hám ıdıs-tabaqlardı juwıwda járdem bere alaman.

definition: to be careful
example_in_english: Watch out - you're going to hit that car!
example_in_uzbek: Ehtiyot bo'ling - siz o'sha mashinani urishingiz mumkin!
example_in_karakalpak: Abaylı bolıń - siz sol mashinanı urıp alıwıńız múmkin!

definition: to find the solution to a problem, etc
example_in_english: We can't work out how to get the Internet connection going.
example_in_uzbek: Internet aloqasini qanday ishga tushirishni bilmayapmiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Internet baylanısın qalay iske túsiriwdi bilmeymiz.

definition: to write information on a piece of paper
example_in_english: Do you want to write down my phone number?
example_in_uzbek: Telefon raqamimni yozmoqchimisiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Telefon nomerimdi jazbaqsız ba?

definition: Without intending to; unintentionally.
example_in_english: I meant to call Helen, but I called Roger by accident.
example_in_uzbek: Men Helenni chaqirmoqchi edim, lekin tasodifan Rogerni chaqirdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Elendi shaqırmaqshı edim, birak tosınnan Rojerdi shaqırdım.

definition: Used to mention something extra; as well as.
example_in_english: In addition to all the food, we took some games to play.
example_in_uzbek: Barcha ovqatlardan tashqari, biz o'ynash uchun ba'zi o'yinlarni olib keldik.
example_in_karakalpak: Barlıq awqatlardan tısqarı, biz oynaw ushın bazı bir oyınlardı alıp keldik.

definition: When someone is a certain number of years old.
example_in_english: I left home at the age of eighteen.
example_in_uzbek: Men sakkiz yoshimda uyimdan ketdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men segiz jasımda úyimnen kettim.

definition: Using a specific mode of transportation.
example_in_english: The best way to get there is by bus.
example_in_uzbek: U yerga borishning eng yaxshi yo'li avtobus bilan.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol jerge barıwdıń eń jaqsı jolı avtobus penen.

definition: In the rear part of something.
example_in_english: Let’s go and sit at the back.
example_in_uzbek: Keling, orqa tomonda o'tiraylik.
example_in_karakalpak: Keliń, arqa tárepte otırayıq.

definition: At the start of something.
example_in_english: I found Chinese hard to learn in the beginning, but it’s easier now.
example_in_uzbek: Dastlab, Xitoy tilini o'rganish qiyin edi, lekin hozir osonroq.
example_in_karakalpak: Dáslep, qıtay tilin úyreniw qıyın edi, biraq házir ańsatıraq.

definition: Inside a ship, plane, or train.
example_in_english: The ship left as soon as all the passengers were on board.
example_in_uzbek: Barcha yo'lovchilar kemaga chiqishi bilan, kema jo'nab ketdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Barlıq jolawshılar kemege miniwi menen, keme jónep ketti.

definition: In the lowest part of something.
example_in_english: What’s it like at the bottom of the sea?
example_in_uzbek: Dengizning tubida qanday?
example_in_karakalpak: Teńizdiń túbinde qanday?

definition: Traveling or working for work-related purposes.
example_in_english: I travel a lot on business.
example_in_uzbek: Men biznes uchun ko'p sayohat qilaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men biznes ushın kóp sayaxat etemen.

definition: Paying with physical money (bills or coins).
example_in_english: The woman paid for the car in cash, which was unusual.
example_in_uzbek: Ayol mashina uchun naqd pul to'lagan, bu odatiy hol emasdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Hayal mashina ushın naq pul tólegen, bul ádettegi jaǵday emes edi.

definition: Stored on a CD, DVD, or video format.
example_in_english: I didn’t see it at the cinema, so I’m watching it on DVD tonight.
example_in_uzbek: Men kinoni kinoteatrlarda ko'rmadim, shuning uchun bugun DVDda tomosha qilaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men kinonı kinoteatrlarda kórmedim, sonıń ushın búgin DVD da kóremen.

definition: Unexpectedly or without planning.
example_in_english: I met Venia by chance in the town center.
example_in_uzbek: Men tasodifan Veniyani shahar markazida uchratdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Veniyanı qala orayında tosınnan ushırattım.

definition: Having control or responsibility over something.
example_in_english: I’d like to speak to the person in charge.
example_in_uzbek: Men mas'ul shaxs bilan gaplashmoqchiman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men juwapker shaxs penen sóylespekshimen.

definition: Located near the sea.
example_in_english: We used to live on the coast.
example_in_uzbek: Biz avval sohilda yashardik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz burın jaǵada jasaytuǵın edik.

definition: Having shared characteristics or interests.
example_in_english: I've got nothing in common with you!
example_in_uzbek: Men siz bilan hech qanday umumiy tomonim yo'q!
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń siz benen hesh qanday uqsaslıǵım joq!

definition: When comparing one thing with another.
example_in_english: Germany is very small in comparison with Russia.
example_in_uzbek: Germaniya Rossiyaga nisbatan juda kichik.
example_in_karakalpak: Germaniya Rossiyaga qaraganda júdá kishi.

definition: Used to introduce a summary or final thought.
example_in_english: In conclusion, I believe that television is a positive invention.
example_in_uzbek: Xulosa qilib aytganda, men televizorni ijobiy ixtiro deb hisoblayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Juwmaqlap aytqanda, men televizordı unamlı oylap tabılıw dep esaplayman.

definition: Being in a healthy, well-maintained, or poor state.
example_in_english: For sale: camping equipment, in good condition.
example_in_uzbek: Sotiladi: kemper uskunalari, yaxshi holatda.
example_in_karakalpak: Satıladı: kemper úskeneleri, jaqsı jaǵdayda.

definition: Communicating with someone.
example_in_english: I’m still in contact with several friends from school.
example_in_uzbek: Men hali ham maktabdagi bir nechta do'stlarim bilan aloqadaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men ele de mekteptegi bir neshe doslarım menen baylanısta bolaman.

definition: In the angle formed by two walls or surfaces.
example_in_english: In the corner of the room there was a guitar.
example_in_uzbek: Xonaning burchagida gitara bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Bólmenin múyeshinde gitara bar edi.

definition: Paying using a credit card or a cheque instead of cash.
example_in_english: Can I pay by cheque?
example_in_uzbek: Men chek bilan to'laysizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Men chek penen tóleysiz be?

definition: At risk of harm or loss.
example_in_english: That house is in danger of falling down.
example_in_uzbek: O'sha uy qulashi xavfi ostida.
example_in_karakalpak: Sol úy qulaw qáwpi astında.

definition: Owing money to someone or an institution.
example_in_english: It can be very worrying to be in debt.
example_in_uzbek: Qarzdor bo'lish juda xavotirli bo'lishi mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Qarızdar bolıw júdá qáweterli bolıwı múmkin.

definition: Eating special food for health or weight control.
example_in_english: I’m on a diet at the moment so I’m not eating any fatty food.
example_in_uzbek: Men hozirda dieta qilaman, shuning uchun yog'li ovqatlar yemayapman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men házir dieta isleymen, sonıń ushın maylı awqatlar jemeymen.

definition: Far away, but visible.
example_in_english: Is that a car I can see in the distance?
example_in_uzbek: Masofada ko'rayotganim avtomobildanmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Alıstan kórip turǵanım avtomobilden be?

definition: When someone is working (on duty) or not working (off duty).
example_in_english: My dad's a policeman and he’s often on duty at night.
example_in_uzbek: Otam politsiyachi va u tez-tez kechasi xizmatda bo'ladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ákem policiyashı hám ol tez-tez túnde xızmette boladı.

definition: Communicating through electronic mail, telephone, or written letter.
example_in_english: Get in touch by e-mail and I’ll send you my photos.
example_in_uzbek: E-mail orqali aloqaga chiqing va men sizga rasmlarimni yuboraman.
example_in_karakalpak: E-mail arqalı baylanısıń hám men sizge súwretlerimdi jiberemen.

definition: Finally; after everything has happened.
example_in_english: I thought we would get there at three, but in the end, we arrived at five.
example_in_uzbek: Biz uchda yetamiz deb o'yladim, lekin oxir-oqibat beshta yetib keldik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz úshke jetemiz dep oyladım, biraq aqırında besewimiz jetip keldik.

definition: The final part of something.
example_in_english: At the end of the film, everyone got married.
example_in_uzbek: Film oxirida hamma turmush qurgan.
example_in_karakalpak: Film aqırında hámme turmıs qurǵan.

definition: Actually; used to give extra or correcting information.
example_in_english: Many people think Greece is hot in the winter but, in fact, it sometimes snows.
example_in_uzbek: Ko'p odamlar Gretsiya qishda issiq deb o'ylashadi, lekin aslida ba'zan qor yog'adi.
example_in_karakalpak: Kópshilik adamlar Greciya qısta ıssı dep oylaydı, biraq haqıyqatında geyde qar jawadı.

definition: Popular or trendy at the moment.
example_in_english: Those shoes are really in fashion at the moment.
example_in_uzbek: O'sha tuflilar hozirda juda modda.
example_in_karakalpak: Sol tuflilar házirde júdá zat.

definition: No longer popular or trendy.
example_in_english: Things seem to go out of fashion very quickly these days.
example_in_uzbek: Hozirgi kunda narsalar juda tez moda bo'lishdan chiqib ketmoqda.
example_in_karakalpak: Házirgi kúnde zatlar júdá tez moda bolıwdan shıǵıp ketpekte.

definition: Supporting or agreeing with something.
example_in_english: Are you in favour of school uniforms?
example_in_uzbek: Siz maktab formalariga qanchalik qo'llab-quvvatlaysiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz mektep formalarına qanshelli qollaysız?

definition: In the beginning, before changes occurred.
example_in_english: I didn’t like Mary at first, but then we became friends.
example_in_uzbek: Dastlab, Maryamni yoqtirmadim, lekin keyin biz do'st bo'ldik.
example_in_karakalpak: Dáslep, Maryamdı jaqtırmadım, biraq keyin biz dos boldıq.

definition: Walking, not using a vehicle.
example_in_english: Can we go from the hotel to the beach on foot, or is it better to take a bus?
example_in_uzbek: Mehmonxonadan plyajga piyoda borishimiz mumkinmi yoki avtobusga o'tish yaxshiroqmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Miymanxanadan plyajǵa piyada barıwımız múmkin be yamasa avtobusqa ótken jaqsıraq pa?

definition: Ahead of or before something/someone.
example_in_english: Don't worry - you can park in front of our house.
example_in_uzbek: Xavotir olmang - siz uyimiz oldida mashinangizni to'xtatishingiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Qáweterlenbeń - siz úyimiz aldında mashinańızdı toqtatıwıńız múmkin.

definition: For enjoyment, not for a serious purpose.
example_in_english: I sing in a band for fun.
example_in_uzbek: Men rohat uchun bir guruhda qo'shiq aytaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men ráxát ushın bir toparda qosıq aytaman.

definition: At a later time, after now.
example_in_english: Will people live on other planets in the future?
example_in_uzbek: Kelajakda odamlar boshqa sayyoralarda yashaydilarmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Keleshekte adamlar basqa planetalarda jasay ma?

definition: Usually, overall, or generally speaking.
example_in_english: In general, TV programs are not educational.
example_in_uzbek: Umuman olganda, televizion dasturlar ta'limiy emas.
example_in_karakalpak: Ulıwma alǵanda, televiziyalıq baǵdarlamalar bilim beriwshi emes.

definition: Memorized completely without reading.
example_in_english: I’ve learnt the song by heart.
example_in_uzbek: Men qo'shiqni yodlab oldim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men qosıqtı yadlap aldım.

definition: Away from work/school for rest or travel.
example_in_english: Isn’t it great to finally be on holiday?
example_in_uzbek: Nihoyat ta'tilda bo'lish juda yaxshi emasmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Aqırı dem alısta bolıw júdá jaqsı emes pe?

definition: For example.
example_in_english: Many countries, for instance the UK, don’t have identity cards.
example_in_uzbek: Ko'pgina mamlakatlarda, masalan, Buyuk Britaniya, shaxsiy guvohnomalar yo'q.
example_in_karakalpak: Kóplegen mámleketlerde, máselen, Ullı Britaniya, jeke gúwalıqlar joq.

definition: Available or happening online.
example_in_english: You can find a lot of information on the Internet.
example_in_uzbek: Siz Internetda ko'p ma'lumot topishingiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz internette kóp maǵlıwmat tabıwıńız múmkin.

definition: Finally, after a long wait.
example_in_english: At last, we’ve arrived!
example_in_uzbek: Nihoyat, biz yetib keldik!
example_in_karakalpak: Aqırında, biz jetip keldik!

definition: Illegal; not allowed by rules or law.
example_in_english: Stealing is against the law.
example_in_uzbek: O'g'irlik qonunga qarshi.
example_in_karakalpak: Urlıq nızamǵa qarsı.

definition: No less than; a minimum amount.
example_in_english: It's cold, but at least it's not raining.
example_in_uzbek: Havo sovuq, lekin kamida yomg'ir yo'q.
example_in_karakalpak: Hawa rayı suwıq, biraq eń keminde jawın joq.

definition: Having strong romantic feelings for someone.
example_in_english: I'm in love with Chris.
example_in_uzbek: Men Krisga oshiqman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Kriske ashıqpan.

definition: In a state of disorder or confusion.
example_in_english: Your room is in a mess. Go and tidy it!
example_in_uzbek: Sizning xonangiz tartibsiz. Bordiyu, uni tartibga keltiring!
example_in_karakalpak: Siziń bólmeńiz tártipsiz. Egerde bolsa, onı tártipke keltiriń!

definition: In the center of something or in the process of doing something.
example_in_english: In the middle of the stage, there was an elephant.
example_in_uzbek: Scenarning o'rtasida fil bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Scenardıń ortasında pil bar edi.

definition: Accidentally, without intending to.
example_in_english: I meant to call Helen, but I called Roger by mistake.
example_in_uzbek: Men Helenni chaqirmoqchi edim, lekin xato bilan Rogerni chaqirdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Xelendi shaqırmaqshı edim, biraq qátelik penen Rojerdi shaqırdım.

definition: Right now; currently.
example_in_english: I'm busy at the moment.
example_in_uzbek: Men hozir bandman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men házir bántpen.

definition: No more than; the maximum amount.
example_in_english: The tickets should cost about €20 at most.
example_in_uzbek: Chiptalar taxminan 20 evro atrofida bo'lishi kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Biletler shama menen 20 evro átirapında bolıwı kerek.

definition: Broadcast on television, radio, or online news.
example_in_english: They mentioned the accident on the news.
example_in_uzbek: Ular hodisani yangiliklarda tilga oldilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Olar hádiyseni jańalıqlarda tilge aldı.

definition: During the nighttime.
example_in_english: It usually gets dark at night.
example_in_uzbek: Odatda kechasi qorong'i bo'ladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ádette túnde qarańǵı boladı.

definition: The way I think or feel about something.
example_in_english: In my opinion, we shouldn’t go to school on Saturdays.
example_in_uzbek: Menimcha, shanba kunlari maktabga borishimiz shart emas.
example_in_karakalpak: Menińshe, shembi kúnleri mektepke barıwımız shárt emes.

definition: Not working properly; broken.
example_in_english: This phone is out of order. We'll have to find another one.
example_in_uzbek: Ushbu telefon ishlamayapti. Biz boshqa telefon topishimiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Bul telefon islemey atır. Biz basqa telefon tabıwımız kerek.

definition: Alone, without help from others.
example_in_english: Did you go to the cinema on your own?
example_in_uzbek: Siz kinoteatrga yolg'iz bordingizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz kinoteatrǵa jalǵız bardıńız ba?

definition: Talking to someone using a telephone.
example_in_english: Come in and wait a second - I'm just on the phone.
example_in_uzbek: Kiring va bir oz kuting - men hozir telefon qilmoqdaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Kiriń hám azmaz kútiń - men házir qońıraw etip atırman.

definition: Feeling stressed due to difficult situations or expectations.
example_in_english: My dad is under a lot of pressure at work at the moment.
example_in_uzbek: Otam hozirda ishda katta bosim ostida.
example_in_karakalpak: Ákem házir jumısta úlken basım astında.

definition: In a place where other people can see.
example_in_english: Politicians can say things in private that they can’t say in public.
example_in_uzbek: Siyosatchilar xususiy ravishda aytadigan gaplarini jamoatchilik oldida aytishlari mumkin emas.
example_in_karakalpak: Siyasatshılar jeke halda aytatuǵın gáplerin jámiechilik aldında aytıwı múmkin emes.

definition: Intentionally, not by accident.
example_in_english: I didn’t do it on purpose.
example_in_uzbek: Men uni qasddan qilmadim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men onı bilqastan islemedim.

definition: Broadcast or played through radio.
example_in_english: I first heard that song on the radio.
example_in_uzbek: Men ushbu qo'shiqni birinchi marta radioda eshitdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men bul qosıqtı birinshi ret radioda esittim.

definition: Available to be rented or leased.
example_in_english: Do you have any rooms for rent?
example_in_uzbek: Sizda ijaraga beriladigan xonalar bormi?
example_in_karakalpak: Sizde ijaraǵa beriletuǵın xanalar bar ma?

definition: As a reply to something.
example_in_english: I am writing in response to your letter of 13th July.
example_in_uzbek: Men 13-iyuldagi xatingizga javoban yozmoqdaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men 13-iyuldegi xatıńızǵa juwap jazıp atırman.

definition: In danger or likely to experience harm.
example_in_english: You're at risk of failing the exam if you don't work harder.
example_in_uzbek: Agar ko'proq ishlamasangiz, imtihonlarda muvaffaqiyatsizlikka uchrash xavfi bor.
example_in_karakalpak: Eger kóbirek islemeseńiz, imtixanlarda sácizlikke ushıraw qáwpi bar.

definition: Available to be bought.
example_in_english: I'm afraid the pictures on the wall aren't for sale.
example_in_uzbek: Men qo'rqaman, devordagi rasmlar sotilmaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Men qorqaman, diywaldaǵı súwretler satılmaydı.

definition: Happening at the planned time.
example_in_english: Our train arrived on schedule.
example_in_uzbek: Bizning poyezd reja bo'yicha yetib keldi.
example_in_karakalpak: Biziń poezd reje boyınsha jetip keldi.

definition: Without telling others; secretly.
example_in_english: We planned a birthday party for Julie in secret.
example_in_uzbek: Biz Julie uchun tug'ilgan kun partiyasini yashirincha rejalashtirdik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz Julie ushın tuwılǵan kún keshesin jasırın túrde rejelestirdik.

definition: Physically fit and healthy.
example_in_english: It's important to me to stay in shape, so I go to the gym whenever I can.
example_in_uzbek: Mening uchun forma saqlash muhim, shuning uchun imkon qadar sport zaliga boraman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men ushın forma saqlaw áhmietli, sonıń ushın imkanı bolǵanınsha sport zalına baraman.

definition: Despite something; even though.
example_in_english: Tina seems to be happy, in spite of her recent problems.
example_in_uzbek: Tina yaqinda yuzaga kelgan muammolariga qaramay, baxtli ko'rinadi.
example_in_karakalpak: Tina jaqında júzege kelgen mashqalalarına qaramastan, baxıtlı kórinedi.

definition: Performing in front of an audience.
example_in_english: There were three actors on stage.
example_in_uzbek: Scenada uchta aktyor bor edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Saxnada úsh aktyor bar edi.

definition: Refusing to work as a form of protest.
example_in_english: We got a day off school because our teachers were on strike.
example_in_uzbek: Biz maktabdan bir kun ta'til oldik, chunki o'qituvchilar grevda edilar.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz mektepten bir kún dem alıs aldıq, sebebi muǵallimler grevde edi.

definition: Crying.
example_in_english: When I found Fiona, she was in tears.
example_in_uzbek: Fiona topganimda, u yig'layotgan edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Fionanı tapqanımda, ol jılap atır edi.

uzbek_word: o‘n yoshlaringizda / yigirma yoshlaringizda / va hokazo
definition: At an age between 13-19 (teens) or 20-29 (twenties), etc.
example_in_english: Life isn't always easy when you're in your teens.
example_in_uzbek: O'spirin paytingizda hayot har doim oson emas.
example_in_karakalpak: Jas óspirim waqtında ómir hár dayım ańsat emes.

definition: Over an extended period.
example_in_english: I haven't seen George for a long time.
example_in_uzbek: Men uzoq vaqt davomida Jorjni ko'rmadim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Jorjdı kóp waqıtqa shekem kórmedim.

definition: Early enough for something.
example_in_english: We arrived at the cinema just in time for the start of the film.
example_in_uzbek: Biz kinoteatrga filmning boshlanishiga vaqtida yetib keldik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz kinoteatrǵa filmniń baslanıwına waqtında jetip keldik.

definition: At the correct or expected time.
example_in_english: Make sure you are here on time tomorrow.
example_in_uzbek: Ertaga vaqtida bu yerda bo'lishingizni ta'minlang.
example_in_karakalpak: Erteń waqtında usı jerde bolıwıńızdı támiyinleń.

definition: Sometimes; occasionally.
example_in_english: I like studying French, but it can be hard work at times.
example_in_uzbek: Men fransuz tilini o'rganishni yoqtiraman, lekin ba'zan bu qiyin bo'lishi mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Men francuz tilin úyreniwdi jaqsı kóremen, biraq geyde bul qıyın bolıwı múmkin.

definition: In the highest position of something.
example_in_english: What was it like at the top of Mount Everest?
example_in_uzbek: Everest tog'ining cho'qqisida qanday edi?
example_in_karakalpak: Everest tawınıń tóbesinde qanday edi?

definition: Placed above or covering something.
example_in_english: He sprinkled sugar on top of the cake.
example_in_uzbek: U tortning ustiga shakar sepdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Ol torttiń ústine qumsheker septi.

definition: The complete amount; all together.
example_in_english: In total, we made over €200 for charity.
example_in_uzbek: Umuman olganda, biz xayriya uchun 200 evrodan ortiq pul yig'dik.
example_in_karakalpak: Ulıwma alǵanda, biz qayırqomlıq ushın 200 evrodan artıq pul jıydıq.

definition: Communicating with someone regularly.
example_in_english: I'm still in touch with several friends from school.
example_in_uzbek: Men hali ham maktabdagi bir nechta do'stlarim bilan aloqadam.
example_in_karakalpak: Men ele de mekteptegi bir neshe doslarım menen baylanısta bolaman.

definition: In a difficult or problematic situation.
example_in_english: We'll be in trouble if the teacher catches us.
example_in_uzbek: Agar o'qituvchi bizni ushlab olsa, biz muammoga duch kelamiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Eger muǵallim bizdi uslap alsa, biz mashqalaǵa dus kelemiz.

definition: Broadcasted on television.
example_in_english: Is there anything on TV tonight?
example_in_uzbek: Bugun televizorda biron narsa bormi?
example_in_karakalpak: Búgin televizorda bir nárse bar ma?

definition: The way I see or think about something.
example_in_english: In my view, we shouldn't go to school on Saturdays.
example_in_uzbek: Menimcha, shanba kunlari maktabga borishimiz kerak emas.
example_in_karakalpak: Menińshe, shembi kúnleri mektepke barıwımız kerek emes.

definition: Alone, without anyone’s help.
example_in_english: Did you go to the cinema by yourself?
example_in_uzbek: Siz kinoteatrga yolg'iz bordingizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz kinoteatrǵa jalǵız bardıńız ba?

definition: accuse
example_in_english: They accused me of stealing some money!
example_in_uzbek: Meni ba'zi pullarni o'g'irlikda ayblashdi!
example_in_karakalpak: Meni biraz aqshalardı urlıqta ayıpladı!

definition: addicted
example_in_english: I'm glad I’m not addicted to drugs.
example_in_uzbek: Men dori-darmonlarga qaram bo'lmasligimdan xursandman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men dári-dármaqlarǵa qaram bolmaytuǵınımnan quwanıshlıman.

definition: admire
example_in_english: I really admire you for everything you’ve achieved.
example_in_uzbek: Siz erishgan barcha narsalar uchun sizni haqiqatan ham hurmat qilaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz erisken barlıq nárseler ushın sizdi haqıyqattan da húrmet etemen.

definition: advantage
example_in_english: One advantage of MP3 players is that they're very small.
example_in_uzbek: MP3 pleerlarning afzalliklaridan biri ularning juda kichik bo'lishidir.
example_in_karakalpak: MP3 pleerlerdiń abzallıqlarınan biri olardıń júdá kishi bolıwı bolıp tabıladı.

definition: advert
example_in_english: Have you seen that really funny advert for coffee?
example_in_uzbek: Siz haqiqatan ham kulgili kofe reklamasini ko'rdingizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz haqıyqatında da kúlkili kofe reklamasın kórdińiz be?

definition: advise
example_in_english: I would advise against studying all night.
example_in_uzbek: Butun tun davomida o'qishga qarshi tavsiya qilaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Túni menen oqıwǵa qarsı usınıs etemen.

definition: afraid
example_in_english: I'm afraid of the dark.
example_in_uzbek: Men qorong'ilikdan qo'rqaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men qarańǵılıqtan qorqaman.

definition: agree
example_in_english: I don’t agree with you about that.
example_in_uzbek: Men bu haqida siz bilan rozi emasman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men bul haqqında siz benen kelispeymen.

definition: allergic
example_in_english: My mum is allergic to gold, so she can’t wear any gold jewellery.
example_in_uzbek: Mening onam oltinga allergiyaga ega, shuning uchun u oltin zargarlik buyumlarini taqib qila olmaydi.
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń anam altınǵa allergiyası bar, sonıń ushın ol altın zergerlik buyımların taǵıp júre almaydı.

definition: amazed
example_in_english: We were all amazed at/by the tricks the magician did.
example_in_uzbek: Biz jodugarning qiliqlaridan barchamiz hayratda qoldik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz yalǵanshınıń qılıqlarınan hámmemiz hayran qaldıq.

definition: angry
example_in_english: Are you angry with me about something?
example_in_uzbek: Siz mendan nimadir uchun g'azabdamisiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz maǵan bir nárse ushın ashıwlısız ba?

definition: apologise
example_in_english: Simon apologised to me for losing my pen.
example_in_uzbek: Simondan qalamimni yo'qotganligi uchun uzr so'radi.
example_in_karakalpak: Simonnan qálemimdi joytıp alǵanı ushın keshirim soradı.

definition: apply
example_in_english: Yiota has applied for a job at the new hotel.
example_in_uzbek: Yiota yangi mehmonxonada ish uchun ariza berdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Yiota jańa miymanxanada jumıs islew ushın arza berdi.

definition: approve
example_in_english: I don’t approve of kids lying to their parents.

example_in_karakalpak: Men balalardıń ata-analarına ótirik sóylewin maqullamayman.

definition: argue
example_in_english: I don't want to argue with you about something so unimportant!
example_in_uzbek: Men siz bilan shunchaki ahamiyatsiz narsa haqida tortishmoqchi emasman!
example_in_karakalpak: Men siz benen tek ǵana áhmietsiz nárse tuwralı aytıspaqshı emespen!

definition: argument
example_in_english: I had an argument with my dad about how much pocket money I get.
example_in_uzbek: Men otam bilan qanchalik pocket pul olishim haqida tortishdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men ákem menen qansha pocket pul alıwım haqqında tartıstım.

definition: arrive
example_in_english: Let’s have dinner as soon as we arrive at the hotel.
example_in_uzbek: Biz mehmonxonaga yetib borganimizda darhol kechki ovqatni yeylik.
example_in_karakalpak: Biz miymanxanaǵa jetip barǵanımızda dárhal keshki awqattı jeyik.

definition: arrive
example_in_english: I hope it’s not raining when we arrive in Manchester.
example_in_uzbek: Manchesterga yetib borganda yomg'ir yog'masligini umid qilaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Manchesterǵa jetip barǵanımda jawın jawmaydı dep úmit etemen.

definition: ashamed
example_in_english: Aren't you ashamed of what you did?
example_in_uzbek: Siz qilgan ishingizdan uyalmaysizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz islegen isinizden uyalmaysız ba?

definition: ask
example_in_english: Why don’t you ask your dad about the party?
example_in_uzbek: Nega siz otangizdan partiya haqida so'ramaysiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Nege siz ákeńizden partiya tuwralı soramaysız?

definition: ask
example_in_english: Ed asked for a pencil, so I lent him one.
example_in_uzbek: Ed qalam so'radi, shuning uchun unga birini berdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Ed qálem soradı, sonıń ushın oǵan birewin berdim.

definition: aware
example_in_english: I'm not aware of any flights being cancelled.
example_in_uzbek: Hech qanday reyslarning bekor qilinganini bilmayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Hesh qanday reyslerdiń biykar etilgeninen xabarım joq.

definition: begin
example_in_english: Let’s begin the lesson with a revision test.
example_in_uzbek: Darsni qayta ko'rib chiqish testidan boshlaylik.
example_in_karakalpak: Sabaqtı qayta kórip shigiw testinen baslayıq.

definition: believe
example_in_english: Do you believe in UFOs?
example_in_uzbek: Siz NLOlarga ishonasizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz NLOlarǵa isenesiz be?

definition: belong
example_in_english: Do these belong to you?
example_in_uzbek: Bu narsalar sizniki emasmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Bul zatlar siziki emes pe?

definition: blame
example_in_english: I blame the accident on Jake.
example_in_uzbek: Men baxtsizlikni Jeykka ayblayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men baxıtsızlıqtı Jeykke taǵaman.

definition: blame
example_in_english: You can’t blame Susie for what happened.
example_in_uzbek: Siz Susini bo'lib o'tgan voqealar uchun ayblay olmaysiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz Susidi bolıp ótken waqıyalar ushın ayıplay almaysız.

definition: book
example_in_english: I read a great book by an English writer about travelling around Europe.
example_in_uzbek: Men ingliz yozuvchisi tomonidan Evropada sayohat qilish haqida yozilgan ajoyib kitobni o'qidim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men anglichan jazıwshısı tárepinen Evropada sayaxat etiw haqqında jazılǵan ájayıp kitaptı oqıdım.

definition: bored
example_in_english: I’m bored with watching this film.
example_in_uzbek: Men ushbu filmni tomosha qilishdan zerikdim.
example_in_karakalpak: Men bul filmdi kóriwden zeriktim.

definition: borrow
example_in_english: You can borrow some money from me, if you like.
example_in_uzbek: Agar xohlasangiz, mendan pul qarz olishingiz mumkin.
example_in_karakalpak: Eger qáleseńiz, mennen aqsha qarız alıwıńız múmkin.

definition: buy
example_in_english: Where did you buy your new shoes from?
example_in_uzbek: Yangi oyoq kiyimlaringizni qayerdan sotib oldingiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Jańa ayaq kiyimlerińizdi qay jerden satıp aldınız?

definition: capable
example_in_english: Are you capable of holding your breath under water for two minutes?
example_in_uzbek: Siz ikki daqiqa davomida suv ostida nafas olishga qodirmisiz?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz eki minut suw astında dem alıwǵa uqıplısız ba?

definition: care
example_in_english: Everyone should care about protecting the environment.
example_in_uzbek: Har bir kishi atrof-muhitni himoya qilishga e'tibor berishi kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Hár bir insan qorshaǵan ortalıqtı qorǵawǵa itibar beriwi kerek.

definition: careful
example_in_english: Please be careful with that vase - it was my grandmother’s.
example_in_uzbek: Iltimos, o'sha vase bilan ehtiyot bo'ling - bu mening buvimniki edi.
example_in_karakalpak: Iltimas, sol vaza menen abaylı bolıń - bul meniń ájapamniki edi.

definition: change
example_in_english: In the story, the witch changes the prince from a man into a frog.
example_in_uzbek: Hikoyada, jodugar shahzodani erkakdan qurbaqaga aylantiradi.
example_in_karakalpak: Gúrrińde, duwa shahzadanı erkekten qurbaqaga aylandıradı.

definition: chat
example_in_english: I’ll have a chat to Mrs Peters about your marks.
example_in_uzbek: Men Mrs Peters bilan sizning baholaringiz haqida suhbatlashaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men missis Peters penen siziń bahalarıńız haqqında sóylesemen.

definition: cheat
example_in_english: You should never cheat at cards.
example_in_uzbek: Siz hech qachon kartalarning aldovini qilmasligingiz kerak.
example_in_karakalpak: Siz hesh qashan kartalardı aldawshılıq qılmawıńız kerek.

definition: choose
example_in_english: I love both my brother and my sister and I can’t choose between them.
example_in_uzbek: Men akamni va opamni ham yaxshi ko'raman va ular orasidan tanlay olmayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men aǵamdı hám ájapamdı da jaqsı kóremen hám olardıń arasınan tańlay almayman.

definition: close
example_in_english: The Town Hall is quite close to my house.
example_in_uzbek: Shahar hokimiyati mening uyimga juda yaqin.
example_in_karakalpak: Qala hákimiyatı meniń úyime júdá jaqın.

definition: combine
example_in_english: If you combine oxygen with hydrogen you get water.
example_in_uzbek: Agar siz kislorod va vodorodni birlashtirsangiz, siz suv hosil qilasiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Eger siz kislorod hám vodorodti birlestirseniz, siz suw payda etesiz.

definition: comment
example_in_english: The politician refused to comment on the situation.
example_in_uzbek: Siyosatchi vaziyat haqida fikr bildirishdan bosh tortdi.
example_in_karakalpak: Siyasatshı jaǵday haqqında pikir bildiriwden bas tarttı.

definition: communicate
example_in_english: I communicate with my cousins in Australia by e-mail.
example_in_uzbek: Men Avstraliyadagi qarindoshlarim bilan elektron pochta orqali aloqa qilaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men Avstraliyadaǵı tuwısqanlarım menen elektron pochta arqalı baylanısaman.

definition: compare
example_in_english: I’d like you to compare your composition to/with your partner's composition.
example_in_uzbek: Men sizdan kompozitsiyangizni sherigingiznikiga solishtirishingizni xohlayman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men sizden kompoziciyańızdı sheriginizdikinen salıstırıwıńızdı qáleymen.

definition: complain
example_in_english: I’m going to complain to the manager about this.
example_in_uzbek: Men bu haqda menejerdan shikoyat qilmoqchiman.
example_in_karakalpak: Men bul haqqında menedjerge shaǵım etpekshimen.

definition: confuse
example_in_english: I think you’ve confused me with someone else.
example_in_uzbek: Menimcha, siz meni boshqa biri bilan aralashtirdingiz.
example_in_karakalpak: Menińshe, siz meni basqa birew menen aralastırdıńız.

definition: congratulate
example_in_english: The coach congratulated us on winning the final.
example_in_uzbek: Murabbiy bizni finalni yutganimiz bilan tabrikladi.
example_in_karakalpak: Trener bizdi finalda jeńiske eriskenimiz benen qutlıqladı.

definition: connect
example_in_english: Can you connect this wire to/with this one?
example_in_uzbek: Siz bu simni shu biri bilan ulay olasizmi?
example_in_karakalpak: Siz bul sımdı usı birewi menen jalǵay alasız ba?

definition: continue
example_in_english: Continue with your work and I'll be back in a moment.
example_in_uzbek: Ishingizni davom ettiring, men birozdan keyin qaytaman.
example_in_karakalpak: Jumısıńızdı dawam etiń, men birazdan keyin kelemen.

definition: cope
example_in_english: I can’t cope with all this homework!
example_in_uzbek: Men barcha bu uy vazifalarini bajara olmayapman!
example_in_karakalpak: Men bul úy tapsırmalarınıń hámmesin orınlay almay atırman!

definition: covered
example_in_english: My shoes are covered in/with mud.
example_in_uzbek: Mening poyabzalim loy bilan qoplangan.
example_in_karakalpak: Meniń ayaq kiyimim ılay menen qaplanǵan.

definition: crazy
example_in_english: Marshall is crazy about video games.
example_in_uzbek: Marshall video o'yinlarga bechora.
example_in_karakalpak: Marshall video oyınlarǵa jaramsız.

definition: criticise
example_in_english: Don’t criticise me for asking questions in class!
example_in_uzbek: Darsda savollar berishimni tanqid qilmang!
example_in_karakalpak: Sabaqta sorawlar bergenimdi sınǵa almań!

definition: cure
example_in_english: Will they ever find a cure for this disease?
example_in_uzbek: Ushbu kasallikka davoni topadilar-mi?
example_in_karakalpak: Bul kesellikke em tabadı ma?

definition: damage

definition: To say no to something.

definition: The act of saying no to something.

definition: To have a connection with something.

definition: To stop working, usually because of age.

definition: The time when a person stops working.

definition: Free from danger or harm.

definition: Something that is not known by others.

definition: In a way that is not known or seen by others.

definition: To provide food, help, or work for someone.

definition: To do something with an object to achieve a result.

definition: Helpful for doing something.

definition: The importance or worth of something.

definition: To go to see a person or place.
